The outstanding feature of this game is the ability to play with a partner on the same device.  To this end, we've dedicated extra attention to developing controls that are comfortable for two players.  In addition, gameplay will be tuned to foster cooperation and support.  Technology has given us processor speeds that are now fast enough, and screen sizes that are now detailed enough to freely experiment with the idea in true indie fashion.
The gameplay, at its core, qualifies this title as an active defense game.  The enemies will move toward the seals on their paths, and you intercept them by moving your finger to attack with your seal in real time.  You complete a stage when you successfully defend the pod, and you must try again if you don't.  You'll also be able to choose how your seals will develop their abilities as you advance through the game.
The game is being developed with C# and Unity, a game development platform that significantly improves our workflow and build stability.  Currently, the game engine is 60% complete, concepts are at 75%, and assets sit at 10% completion.

Why It's Worth It
While the advent of smartphones has connected us to each other in remarkable ways, we must be careful not to forget the benefits of face-to-face interaction; we've all noticed when others pay a little too much attention to their phones.  Rather than fight progress, however, I feel that we should find ways to embrace it properly.  I want to create something that will fit into the catalog of games that brings friends and family together.  Thus, I decided to design our game to encourage these shared experiences.


As with most industries, innovation both sustains and improves the standard. Today, the mobile game market is saturated with carbon copies and updated classics.  While these products have a place, I feel that it is time for independent game developers to take risks and generate unique experiences.  When I founded Studio 99, it was with this exact promise...to dedicate myself to producing "creative fun."
And...
We chose the little harp seal pup as this project's mascot to stand for the humane treatment of animals.  We recognize and respect that the Canadian government has made progress to limit seal hunts over the years.  Even so, the innocence of these animals still serves as a powerful lesson for the sanctity of all life.  We've also included, as an optional perk, our own pledge to donate to an animal rescue center on your behalf.


How Your Donation Will Help
To date, I have invested my own funds and full attention to the project over the course of the past ten weeks.  Now it's your opportunity to give us the chance to continue our commitment.  If our campaign goal is met, the donations we receive will be used as follows:


1,900 for regular living expenses during production per month for four months

630 for equipment including a backup storage device and tablet for our artist

840 to cover crowdfunding costs like credit card fees

Donations that take us past our campaign goal will be used towards improved equipment, software licenses, and future content.  Also, take the time to explore the perks we're offering--they all come with the ad-free version of our game.
If you have any questions about donations, perks, or other topics, feel free to contact us!

Looking Ahead
We intend to challenge ourselves with an aggressive schedule, and although we ask for four month's worth of funds, we expect to release our game in a half year from the conclusion of this campaign.  To give you a more concrete idea of our plans, the following is a list of targets by month:


game engine complete / playable build available
major art assets finished
reward system framework and user experience (UX) in place
title and other menus complete / begin designing stages
stages and enemy AI set / most assets completed
complete game final look and feel / final testing phase

Since we are a very small team, individual schedules and setbacks present a unique obstacle to production consistency.  It also means that member must spend the time to be more meticulous for a professional product.  However, after having seen our progress since the game's inception, I'm confident that our dedication will bring another quality title to fun-loving people everywhere.

Finally, to honor your own confidence in us, I'll be posting regular updates and material as the campaign continues.


Spread the word, and thanks for your time!

story:
About me and my brain!

I am a 41 year old Graphic Designer who has worked with and along side the toy industry for over 15 years.

For the majority of that time I applied my trade as a creative with the worlds largest toy manufacturer in Hasbro (as well as several other major toy companies), designing packaging, developing brands and producing identity for some of their biggest product ranges, Monopoly, Game of Life, Trivial Pursuit and Cluedo (Clue in the US) to name a few.

I have always had a passion for creating, designing and inventing new ideas, with my first ever game being created when I was still in High School, and this is a game that I really want to bring to life now... this will be game to help develop a number of skills from strategy and tactics to team play and co-operation.

To give you an idea of me and how my brain works I want to share a number of passions, ideas and projects I am currently developing.

  • I have a real passion for Photography and carry my camera with me at ALL times in case I see 'that' photo!
  • I am currently writing 2 books... one with my young daughter aimed at children and the second is a crime novel that I am half way through penning!
  • I have a passion for creative cooking and developing my own unique flavours and tastes.
  • And I guess most importantly there are the games and toy concepts! These I have had niggling away in my head for several years and these I need to create - to develop and to make real.


Why is this SO important to me?

How many of us dream or think of an idea and then do nothing about it? These games are just some of the ideas that run through my head, the trouble is they won't go away - in fact there is one idea that I've harbored for 24 years!!
I want to make my ideas become reality. I don't want to look back in 30 years time and wish I had done something about this! I want these ideas to come alive and ultimately for you and others everywhere to enjoy them!

The truth is you never know if it's a good idea unless you try it...


What games am I thinking about making?

I don't want to give too much away at this point... but the first of the games is a strategy game that can be played one of two ways... with or without dice, depends how you want to play it.

Think Chess mixed with Warhammer....?!!? Though this game is very much modeled around the here and now... this is not a futuristic battle! (not yet anyway!!!) This game I think sits alongside the likes of Chess, but adds a modern and exciting appeal to people of all ages!

This is a first rendition example of a section of the board, which will be made up of between 370 and 407 hexagonal spaces.



What I want to do over the next month is share some more images of the initial version as I develop the layout - I will add more as soon as I can!

The second game - I am not sure how best to describe, but it involves marbles!

I have another two ideas that I need to finalise but want to get these two to a working concept first...

Why am I asking for £15,000?

The truth is I don't have the funds to do this alone! Your willingness to believe in someone you don't know or have an understanding of their vision but yet still donate money is the only way I will ever be able to convert my ideas from dreams into reality...

The funds will be used in a number of ways:

  • Firstly, I need to develop my ideas up, this means creating mock ups and ultimately working models to see that the concepts work!
  • I will need to work with experts in toy modeling to help develop the games to help perfect them and to make sure they work!
  • Finally I will need to produce and promote a final working version to take to the industry and sell...
If you can help me in any way financially I would really appreciate your input, whether from £1 to £100, the money will be invested in finally realising a dream...


What will I do with the concepts once developed?

This is an avenue that I am still exploring, the one thing I do know is that I have made MANY contacts in the industry over the years... people with knowledge and vision,


    Risks & Challenges

    I appreciate that there may be obstacles in the way but I promise with my creative ability, my commitment to working hard, to invest all of myself into my ideas is something I hope you can trust. Not only that, but because I have worked with many companies over the years and I feel there is a real opportunity for fresh input, fresh fun! How many versions of Monopoly do you need?


    Why help me?

    Simply because with out your help, I wont be able to do this... and as a way of saying thank you, I will generate a logo design for 5 people who donate £5 or more. Anyone who donates £50 or more will have their name put into a hat to have a complete corporate brand identity overview... i will look at your logo design and how to implement that over any number of company uses from livery to letterheads etc.

    Here are a small selection of logos I have developed and generated over the last few years for various companies, both big multi nationals and small private local firms!


    Other Ways You Can Help

    I am looking for help in any number of ways, yes the money will produce the goods, but you can help simply by forwarding my campaign:

    • Please help me just get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
    • You can use the Indiegogo share tools to help me make this all happen!

story:
The creative workshop of Foscrot Ltd. from London created an entirely new and hopefully globally successful educational board game: 'Grynco - Save the Planet'.

The main goal of this game, besides having fun and developing tactical skills, is to educate about the protection of the environment. 

We want to raise awareness about actions that help save energy, natural resources and our planet in a fun and easy to understand way. This game is a result of careful and long term testing of mathematic and logical moves and with your help we want to make it a global success. 

The game has been tested among players of various backgrounds and the feedback we gathered from them is that "Grynco - Save the Planet" is a dynamic, interesting and, above all, fun game.

Authors: Tomislav (left, 28), Marin (right, 31)

As the game title suggests, the theme of this game is related to global environmental protection.

Every field, every possible move and every situation in the game was carefully designed to be relatable to the present global challenges in environmental protection. 

One of the basic premises of this game is the time limit, which can be related to the time we have left for protecting the environment and combating climate change.

The duration of the game depends on the number of players, while the concept of the game allows up to 10 players.

On your way to becoming a "Grynco Hero" you will meet a series of obstacles and challenges. Game play is possible in clockwise and counter-clockwise direction, each with its' own challenges. 56 cards marked as 'bad for you' contain 56 different environmentally unfriendly scenarios that are presented as long texts, and given that the players have to read each card out loud, the length of the text affects the duration of the whole game. In complete contrast is the content of the cards marked with 'good for you' that contain 56 environmentally friendly scenarios. The scenarios are short in and allow for a longer game.

If we compare these scenarios with the current situation, environmental pollution brings long-term consequences for the planet, while environmental actions help protect the environment and the planet as a whole.

The cards marked with 'license' allow players to improve the environmental situation in certain areas on the board. Environmental improvement brings many "positive factors in the game" and, from a psychological point of view, encourages the players to make small steps that in the end count a lot towards global environment preservation. It is true that small steps will not change the situation immediately, but the overall effort of all of us can indeed be revolutionary.

With each improvement of the environment players get a certain amount of Grynco certificates, while each "license" states how many certificates the player gets. The winner is the player who collected the highest number of certificates during the game.

Cards marked with 'secret mission' usually have a 'license' as the reward and represent the most entertaining part of the game. Rules of the game state that by taking that card, players must perform the "secret mission" in a specified time period or pay the stated amount to Grynco Bank. 

During the testing phase, it turned out that the players preferred to perform secret missions, and would rather imitate the sound of a washing machine for 40 seconds, act out waste separation, or play the "professor" than pay the bank. The game has a total of 56 "secret mission" cards, each with completely different content.

During the game you can declare an 'ecological disaster', while one "bad for you" card has the task titled 'A minute of silence for the Planet'. This card reduces the duration of the game, but also provides time to reflect on the improvement of the state of the planet. Three 'good for you' cards enable the extension of game duration for a maximum of 30 minutes (each card for 10 minutes).

Imagine if this game was played by a million people who will accept all the thoughts and actions contained within the game in the next couple of years? Is there a better way to get people of all ages educated about the importance of environmental protection and to encourage them to change daily habits than through fun and games?

During the testing phase, most of the players created complex strategies to gather certificates and win. From a psychological point of view, players will learn that to improve the environment real efforts are necessary, but also that the result pays off.
After the testing, the players stated that they thought more about protecting the environment, and remembered parts of the game, especially the "secret missions".

Although the game at "first hand" looks easy, a series of highly complex rules delivers an entirely new and very exciting way of gameplay. As we mentioned at the beginning the game helps develop tactical skills, but it is important to point out that the game also affects the development of mathematical skills. 

According to our estimates, this game can be played by anyone aged 10 and up, which makes it a great family game.

Since we are an extremely young team and company, we hope that you will recognize the quality of this game and support our efforts. 

Your donation will help us with: the graphic design of the game; early production of the game (the entire game will be produced on recycled paper and from organic plastics with CO2 emissions of the production and transport neutralized on the global CO2 market); marketing and sales of the game around the world. 

If you like this project, we invite you to support our Indiegogo campaign! Last but not least, if the project proves successful, we will annually allocate a certain percentage of the profits for various environmental projects around the world.

Help us create the game and people around the world in becoming "Grynco heroes"! It's time to have fun!

story:
9/10 Update: Klepto is currently ranked #18 on Steam Greenlight!

Klepto - Steam Greenlight Page


Campaign Summary

Klepto is a game that Nate and I (Matt) have been planning over the past year and we’ve recently dove full force into development. We've assembled an amazing team of 3D artists to help us on this massive undertaking. However, there’s still a TON of work necessary to build up the extensive library of interactive and lootable assets so we've decided to reach out to you, the community to help speed things up.


Funding

100% of this campaign funding is going into this game, not in our pockets. The whole team has agreed to a revenue based payment model where we all earn our keep from the sales following a successful launch of this game. This keeps development costs to the absolute minimum. 

The primary use of funding from this campaign will be put towards building a vast library of interactive and lootable 3D assets for the game. The remaining portion will be reserved for marketing the release.

We have some very talented artists on the team but the amount of custom modeling and texturing work needed will be extremely time consuming without this financial support. However, even if this funding campaign is unsuccessful, we will still be bringing the completed project to market. However, this will negatively impact the timeline by a significant amount.

Weekly Comm. Schedule

Tuesday's: Feature Topic Article 

A detailed discussion on a specific gameplay feature or component

Friday's: Dev Blog
Development update and overview of the team's work for the week.

Saturday's: #screenshotsaturday
Follow us on Twitter for new screenshots every Saturday.

Klepto

Note: For a more in-depth look into the project, visit our Steam Greenlight Concept page.

Klepto allows players to acquire a variety of items using less-than-legal means. The single-player campaign is broken down into three skill tiers; Amateur, Semi-Pro & Professional. Progression through each tier unlocks all new features and gameplay mechanics.

Amateur: An opportunist with a limited tactical skillset who relies on brute force and quick grabs.

Expert: A veteran of the craft who utilizes disguises, tools and other techniques to skillfully gain entry into target homes.

Professional: A master in the art of unlawfully acquiring profitable goods. Skilled players of this tier will utilize high tech tools and real-world hacking techniques to use home security, surveillance and automation systems to their own advantage.  


Features

o Sandbox neighborhoods

o Multiplayer

o Full VR Support (Oculus and SteamVR)

o Character Progression

o Procedurally Generated Loot

o Hacking & Network Simulation

o Day/Night Cycle

Player Progression Articles

Part 1: The Amateur

Part 2: The Expert

Part 3: The Professional (Coming Soon)


Updated Backer Rewards

$50 Reward

Closed Beta Access
Available 1-3 months before Early Access launch.

Early-Access Game

Custom Picture in Game
We’ll place one of your submitted images somewhere inside the game.

In-game Item: Exclusive Backer T-Shirt
Show off your support in multiplayer sessions by wearing an exclusive t-shirt featuring the Klepto Backer logo on the back.

Digital Download: Soundtrack

Name in Credits

Exclusive Backer Section on Forum
A private VIP section of the Klepto forums. This area will receive priority responses to questions for the developers. You’ll also be the first to see new concept artwork and previews before they are publically posted.


$100 Reward

Custom Street Name 
A street in the game will be named after you and displayed for all to see.

In-game Item: Zeus 2000i Laptop
This backer exclusive laptop comes pre-installed with a +10% Speed upgrade to run scans and and execute scripts faster.

[Backtrace IPs and hack mainframes 10% faster with new all new Zeus 2000i. Supplies are limited. Reserve yours by pre-ordering today. ]

In-game Item: Exclusive Backer Hoodie
Show off your support in multiplayer sessions by wearing an exclusive hoodie featuring the Klepto Backer logo on the back.

+1 Additional Copy of Game
One for you and one for an accomplice.

+All the perks of the previous tiers


$250 Reward

Create a Resident
Design one of the pre-made player characters available in the character select screen.  

[Use Mixamo’s Fuse 3D Character Creator (Basic or Full) to create an in-game character for the game. Some restrictions may apply to ensure custom character adheres to design standards. Sorry - No zombies or orcs.]

+2 Additional Copies of Game
One for you and two for your accomplices.

+All the perks of the previous tiers*


$500 Reward

Neighborhood Sponsor

Custom house
Send us the floorplans & pictures and our art team will make it a permanent part of a neighborhood in Klepto.

[Some restrictions may apply to ensure custom houses adhere to design standards of planned neighborhoods.]

Create a Character
Design one of the pre-made multiplayer characters available in the character select screen.  

[Use Mixamo’s Fuse 3D Character Creator (Basic or Full) to create an in-game character for the game. Some restrictions may apply to ensure custom character adheres to design standards. Sorry - No zombies or orcs. ]

+3 Additional Copies of Game
One for you and three for your accomplices.

+All the perks of the previous tiers*


*Excludes additional game copies from previous tiers

In-game Item: Zeus 2000i LaptopThis backer exclusive laptop comes pre-installed with a +10% Speed upgrade to run scans and and execute scripts faster.[Backtrace IPs and hack mainframes 10% faster with new all new Zeus 2000i. Supplies are limited. Reserve yours by pre-ordering today. ]
In-game Item: Exclusive Backer HoodieShow off your support in multiplayer sessions by wearing an exclusive hoodie featuring the Klepto Backer logo on the back.
+1 Additional Copy of GameOne for you and one for an accomplice.
+All the perks of the previous tiers
$250 Reward
Create a ResidentDesign one of the pre-made player characters available in the character select screen.  [Use Mixamo’s Fuse 3D Character Creator (Basic or Full) to create an in-game character for the game. Some restrictions may apply to ensure custom character adheres to design standards. Sorry - No zombies or orcs.]
+2 Additional Copies of GameOne for you and two for your accomplices.
+All the perks of the previous tiers* 
$500 Reward
Neighborhood Sponsor 
Custom houseSend us the floorplans & pictures and our art team will make it a permanent part of a neighborhood in Klepto.[Some restrictions may apply to ensure custom houses adhere to design standards of planned neighborhoods.]
Create a CharacterDesign one of the pre-made multiplayer characters available in the character select screen.  [Use Mixamo’s Fuse 3D Character Creator (Basic or Full) to create an in-game character for the game. Some restrictions may apply to ensure custom character adheres to design standards. Sorry - No zombies or orcs. ]
+3 Additional Copies of GameOne for you and three for your accomplices.
+All the perks of the previous tiers*
*Excludes additional game copies from previous tiers

story:
Short Summary 

Featherman a mobile game by Hagao Studio:

Hi, we're Hagao Studio and we need your help to finish our first game Featherman!


About this Project

HELP US FINISH THE GAME!

Key Features:

In Featherman you take on the role of a Black Faced Spoonbill, a rare bird who must lead their flock through the dangers of their annual migration. There are plenty of dangers on this trip both natural and human, do you have the skills to safely lead and build your flock? Luckily you are not alone, the mysterious Featherman is also here to give you advice, power-ups and guide you on your journey! We are committed to working with local wetland conservation efforts so you can make real world impact playing Featherman!

Game includes:

·  Flying action gameplay

·  Build your flock in breeding mini-game

·  Race against summer and winter to complete your migration in time

·  Store full of power-ups and customization

·  Fun and engaging story

·  Beautiful artwork and graphics

·  Original soundtrack and sound effects



What We Need & What You Get

We are a newly formed studio and while we initially began this project as part of our master’s degree we want to carry on developing it beyond our graduation. In order to do this we’re looking to Indiegogo to help us continue to develop this game while maintaining financial independence as is so important for a start up studio such as us. We have already made several of the chapters within the game but we need your help to finish the remaining chapters and release the full game! 

We will spend the money we make thusly:

40% Development

20% Graphic Design Outsourcing

15% Licensing costs

15% Marketing 

10% Indiegogo Fees

Above: The evolution of our design process so far!


The Impact

Did you know that there are less than 3300 Black Faced Spoonbills left in the world! These beautiful creatures not only have to deal with the dangers of a perilous migration every year but also suffer from habitat destruction by humans. Luckily  something is being done to combat this, wetland conservation areas that have been maintained along the migratory path offer a safe haven for these birds to rest on their journey. With Featherman we aim to not only raise awareness about the plight of these endangered birds but also make people aware of the excellent conservation work that I being done to help them. By making in game purchases a percentage of this money goes directly to conservation efforts in order to help increase the numbers of these special birds.


The Perks!

FEATHER MAN

-Featherman Gold Edition

Featherman is a free game but by pledging to this tier you can get Gold Edition! This gives you access to all purchasable items in game for only $3!

FEATHERED FRIEND

-Thank you Credit on our website

-Featherman Gold Edition

We will add your name to a list of Feathered Friends on our website www.feathermangame.com to show our thanks for your support!

MUSICMAN

-Complete Featherman Soundtrack

-Thank you Credit on our website

-Featherman Gold Edition

You will get a copy of the complete Featherman soundtrack, chill out and listen to the original score created just for this game!

DIGITALMAN

-Digital Production Book

-Complete Featherman Soundtrack

-Thank you Credit on our website

-Featherman Gold Edition

Want to see the design process so far? What did the board game prototype look like? Was Featherman always a man? With this tier you will receive a digital production book detailing the production process with images of behind the scenes concept art.

BETAMAN

-Participate in the Featherman Beta

-Digital Production Book

-Complete Featherman Soundtrack

-Thank you Credit on our website

-Featherman Gold Edition

Participate in the Beta! Featherman is only ½ done but you can help in the development of the second half by providing feedback and suggestions after playing the Beta version. Your suggestions could end up in the final game!

ART AND FEATHERED

-A portrait of yourself drawn in the Featherman art style

-Participate in the Featherman Beta

-Digital Production Book

-Complete Featherman Soundtrack

-Thank you Credit on our website

-Featherman Gold Edition

Love the look of Featherman? Be drawn in the cute Featherman art style with perk.

FEATHERED FAN

-Appear in the game as an NPC

-A portrait of yourself drawn in the Featherman art style

-Participate in the Featherman Beta

-Digital Production Book

-Complete Featherman Soundtrack

-Thank you Credit on our website

-Featherman Gold Edition

Always wanted to be in a videogame? This is your chance! We have opportunities to put you into the game in Non Playable Character roles. Will you be a friendly character aiding the flock on its journey, or a an evil enemy character trying to eat the birds? 


Risks & Challenges

While we have known each other for almost a year this is the first game we’re making together. In order to make sure we are not over ambitious or over estimating our capabilities we have been running to a tight planning and development schedule. Using the SCRUM method of development we have progress meetings every day and bigger sprint meetings every 2 weeks with internal deadlines to ensure we stay on target. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate but still want to help us that's fine too! You can follow us on social media either on:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HagaoStudios?ref=bookm...

Twitter: https://twitter.com/HagaoStudio

Instagram: https://instagram.com/hagaostudio/

story:
Short Summary

Bridge of Mission International (BMI) was established with a vision to function as a “bridge” between the missionaries abroad and lay missionaries who are sent to deliver the love of Christ to the needy, neglected, abandoned and underprivileged people throughout the world. In 2013, BMI missionaries visited two orphanages run by the Missionaries Of the Poor (MOP), http://www.missionariesofthepoor.org/, and encountered many orphans with tremendous talents given by God. Upon realization that such talents need to be developed, the "Dream Project" was established. We embarked on this project with a vision to develop a talent as well as bring hopes to as many orphans in Africa as possible. This "Dream Project" also incorporates the "Scholarship Program" for some of the selected orphans with high academic skills to pay for their college tuition.

We believe that this "Dream Project" will not only bring the quality life to these orphans, but also affects the life of many others who are in dire need of our help. We also envision that these orphans will become a leader with a great vision one day and attribute to their communities in many ways.

The funds that we are raising will be sent to the MOP, who has been our mission partner since 2009.

story:
"Gaming can make a better world." - Jane McGonigal

Short Version

We're a tiny indie game startup with big dreams in Jerusalem, Israel. So far we are two guys: one Canadian-Israeli Jew, one American Christian (see short bios below). We have two games published on iOS and Android (get them here for free) and others on the way. We're trying to raise enough money to hire a graphic designer to take this project to the next level and get closer to our long-term goal:

The long-term goal of Beace Games is to build a quality game studio in Jerusalem where Christians, Muslims and Jews work side-by-side, as cooperative partners designing and building cooperative games together. Beace Games.

Who We Are

Gilan Israel is a web programmer originally from Vancouver, B.C., Canada. In his day job he works as a front-end web programmer for a small company. He would rather be making computer games full-time. He lives in Jerusalem with his patient wife and their obnoxious cat.

Bill Burdick is interested in things that are neato, like lazy evaluation and new ways to interact with programs. And tabletop role playing games and stuff. Originally from Des Plaines, Illinois, he lives in Jerusalem with his patient wife and their gigantic dog.


Bill and Gilan work on a hardware problem

The Impact

This campaign is a tiny starting point. If successful, it will get us one step closer to the ultimate goal of building a quality game studio in Jerusalem where Christians, Muslims and Jews work side-by-side, as cooperative partners designing and building cooperative games together.

Our first published game - Holmes Cryptic Cipher (free on iOS and Android)

Our Vision

Beace Games is a team of two indie programmers trying to make smart games for smart people. We are currently doing this in our spare time with zero budget.

But there's more to it than that. We specifically want to make peace games, not war games. 

Too many popular games today are about shooting as many people as possible, or conquering the world. Don't get us wrong. We occasionally enjoy those games as well. But it's a greater challenge and a greater calling to create games that:

  • make you think
  • promote cooperation over combat
  • tell compelling and unique stories with positive messages
  • feature realistic strong women and minorities not as afterthoughts, eye candy or DLC but as integral parts of the vision
  • prefer character, storytelling, complex strategy or quality puzzles rather than flashy graphics and over-the-top sound effects and explosions

And what better place to build a company with such a vision than Jerusalem? There is so much potential here, with a culturally-diverse and well-educated population. There is a high-tech scene but it is small, dwarfed by Tel-Aviv just an hour away. The long-term goal of Beace Games is to build a quality game studio in Jerusalem where Christians, Muslims and Jews work side-by-side, as cooperative partners designing and building cooperative games together. Beace Games.

What We Need (First Steps)

We need about $500 US to pay fair wages to a graphic artist so that we can:

  • make our games less ugly and more user-friendly
  • make our website pop instead of making your eyes bleed
  • get our games noticed by people who will enjoy them instead of those lucky enough to stumble upon them in the great morass that is iTunes

What You Get

Did I mention we currently have zero budget? We will thank and acknowledge every backer by name (unless requested otherwise) on our website. We will also give you space in our Beace Tower page - a linkable block of pixels which you can design however you want, whether it be your name, an advertisement, or simply a link to your own website.

The Beace Tower

Risks & Challenges

This is our first stab at crowdfunding, and we're new to game development, so we're probably doing everything wrong. Hopefully we're learning.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you believe in our vision, please spread the word about this campaign using the Indiegogo share tools. You can also:

  • Share this campaign and our website on Facebook and Twitter
  • Share our website so people can see how ugly it is
  • Download and play our games on Android and iOS
  • Rate and review our games on Google Play and in iTunes

And that's all there is to it.

Download and play our games on Android and iOS
Rate and review our games on Google Play and in iTunes
   And that's all there is to it.

story:
Hello, and thank you for taking the time to read about my company and thank you for considering pledging. My Name is Reid Wilson. I am currently going to college for a major in economics and a minor in business. I am 21 years old and video games, comics, memes, YouTube videos, and artwork have all been a very huge part of my life. I have seen many people try and try to make their ideas work and yet they fail to become popular even though their work is amazing. There are just some unknown variables that can keep someone from gaining popularity. With my website I aim to help popularize these videos, artwork, comic writings, and even manga. The website is for all sorts of gamers, but is not limited to the gaming community. Cosplayers that are not based off gaming characters would still be able to come to the site if they need some help gaining recognition for their hard work.

      When you pledge for my website you will be helping me break down the greatest barrier to entry in any business setting. This is known as the start up cost. I am a college student and like most college student I have little money, and your pledge will help my dream become reality sooner. The pledges will go to networking, server, marketing, domain name, and start up costs. My goal is $1500 which I feel can be easily met, however if my goal is not met the money goes right back to you and there is no worry.

      There are always risks and challenges when created a brand new business; however with your help and your pledges I believe that I will be able to overcome them. I am a very hard working person and have been going to college to learn the techniques to create a very successful business. With my vast knowledge and hardworking skills, combined with your pledges I believe that my website will become reality.

      Thank you again for taking the time to consider pledging and reading about who I am and what my website is going to be about. I ask of you only two things please pledge you will not regret it, and please help get the word out there for me, share this for me and help me get others to pledge like you have.

    Thank you

story:
It's Here! The Bible is now a Game!

We have lost the attention of today's youth and even adults to the noise and chatter of the modern world. Our kids are stuck to social media, apps and games; parents are stuck to emails and the hectic schedule of life. Although the importance and immense benefits of Bible reading in our spiritual experience cannot be overstated, the discipline of Bible study has lost its appeal to many Christians. The Bible appears to have essentially fallen to the class of "boring" stuff.

Thankfully games still have our attention. Whether we are playing for fun as a pastime hobby, or we are taking part in a competition, the evolution of mobile devices has made games even more important part of our lives. However, Bible game developers have failed to meet the expectations of lovers of God’s word for a recognized game genre.

Precepts™ is finally here to change that!



Unprecedented Bible Experience!

Precepts™ offers players a gamified Bible experience that makes the routine of Bible reading fun and interesting. This newly invented Bible game is inspired by the thought of taking the Bible to the place of interest of youths – games.

Precepts™ is officially the Bible’s Game version! Technically speaking, the premise for the Precepts™ game design is that the challenge of attempting to spell Bible words with letter tiles drawn randomly brings to players’ memory Scripture passages that had previously been read. 


The Design of Precepts™ game environment is truly inspired by the Holy Book!



The First-ever Gospel Sport is Evolving!

Ultimately the goal of this unconventional ministry is the evolution of a novel brand of gospel sport, very similar to the Scrabble Championship that will stimulate and sustain the study of the Bible and help participants to grow in the faith. Find below pictures from a pilot competition – The Precepts™ Maestro’s Treasure Hunt held 2013 in Lagos Nigeria, with the collaboration of the Christian Broadcasting Network CBN engaging 16 Teens Churches in the first-ever Bible Knowledge Competition using Precepts™ to test their Bible intelligence. 



The New Precepts™ App.

The concept of the Bible in a game genre received commendation from my friends at its conception and continued support and encouragement through the 6 years of developing the idea and eventual efforts to bring the game to the public. The current version of Precepts™ Crossword Puzzle is a physical box with card-bound board and game pieces.

Pursuant to the intention of taking God’s word to the place of interest of game lovers, developing the electronic version of the game – Precepts™ App – became necessary. This is to make the game accessible to a global audience. The campaign on Indiegogo is to enable friends, family and members of the public who subscribe to the cause contribute towards the actualization of the Precepts™ App project.

In a world that has gone largely digital, a board game in a physical box is obviously out of tune with current trend. The physical board will still be available though, for those who prefer the traditional card-bound board game with game pieces.

The new Precepts™ App will offer lovers of God’s word the opportunity to stay connected to the Bible wherever they are. Precepts™ App will be made available FREE in mobile platforms such as iPhone, iPad, Windows phone and tablet Android phone and tablet.






What We Need & What You Get

Change is possible with one person alone! And that one person is YOU! We request your support to raise the funds required to make us continue the awesome work we have started. We’ve spent several months and thousands of dollars working on Precepts™ to get it to a fully functional game in the physical but we need to do more. We are already working on  the apps which promises to be an even more awesome gaming and Bible learning experience. Your support and funding helps us make the various apps (Web,Windows,Android,iOS and Facebook) a reality.  See breakdown chart below.

As our backer, you get early access to the app. This isn’t just a Bible learning platform or app. It’s a movement. We are people-powered. We are counting on you. Together we win! The Chart below illustrates the financial requirements to fully develop the four versions of the Precepts™ app. Precepts™ App pilot project is estimated at $50,000 USD. 

Despite limiting circumstances, we’ve come this far in advancing this cause. If we could afford to fund this project, you probably might have been getting an invite to play Precepts™ App. We could really use some help to make the Precepts™ App a reality.

Precepts™ App Project is estimated at $50,000 USD. These are the present needs of the project.

1. AppBuilding ($32,000) – Developing and porting App to mobile app stores (finished App will be ported to 4 platforms – iOS (phone & ipad), Windows (phone & tablet), Android (phone & tablet) and Web version).

2. Game Design Interface ($8,000) – Setting up office to interface with developer’s dashboard. Also monitoring process and tracking the progress of the project through the period of building the app (this includes equipments and Internet Service for Home team collaboration).

3. Maintenance ($6,000) – Initial debugging of app, maintenance and updates.

4. Promotion ($4,000) – Online promotion of the App.


Perks & Rewards

For your various levels of support we  have a showing of the perks you will get for the support to the right side of this campaign page in addition to being listed on the Jachin Wall.

Jachin Wall - The Precepts™ App Lifetime Supporters Community!

Take pride in a lifetime listing in the community of Precepts™ Supporters. All backers get a place on the Jachin Wall. The names of all Precepts™ Supporters will be listed with their profile picture along with their favorite verse of the Scriptures on the Wall. 

Jachin is the name of one of the two bronze pillars erected in front of Solomon’s temple. That’s exactly what you are to us – a pillar of support. Jachin Wall will be featured on the Precepts™ website and a button will be provided on the Game app that displays the list of all contributors on the device. 


Risks & Challenges

The risks and challenges associated with this projects are indeed minimal. The physical version of the game has been played severally and proven to be a success even up to Championship levels. For the electronic version we have carefully selected developers through a rigorous process as the e-version will involve artificial intelligence. The selected developer has full understanding of the requirements of the game and has good track records in developing games of similar genre.

Stanley Ohanugo currently holds the global patent for this invention fully registered both with the Nigerian Authorities and World Intellectual Property Organisation (WIPO). This will also extend to the Apps currently being developed.




Other Ways You Can Help

Help us build a strong community and win! Even if you are not backing us with funds, you can support this cause just by sharing this campaign. Ensure you are logged in to your Indiegogo account and then share using the Indiegogo sharing tools on the top left corner of this page. Please invite friends and family to do the same.We’ll gift lovely branded t-shirts to 50 backers with the most Indiegogo referral counts.Thanks in advance for sharing!




Get in touch

If you have any questions regarding this campaign,you can please leave a comment or get in touch with us via;

email : obie.akpachiogu@fredmclaurence.com

email : stanley.ohanugo@fredmclaurence.com

phone : +1 567 248 0866 [Mon-Tues 10.00 hrs to 16.00 hrs EST]

We look forward to hearing from you.
story_txt:
It's Here! The Bible is now a Game!We have lost the attention of today's youth and even adults to the noise and chatter of the modern world. Our kids are stuck to social media, apps and games; parents are stuck to emails and the hectic schedule of life. Although the importance and immense benefits of Bible reading in our spiritual experience cannot be overstated, the discipline of Bible study has lost its appeal to many Christians. The Bible appears to have essentially fallen to the class of "boring" stuff.Thankfully games still have our attention. Whether we are playing for fun as a pastime hobby, or we are taking part in a competition, the evolution of mobile devices has made games even more important part of our lives. However, Bible game developers have failed to meet the expectations of lovers of God’s word for a recognized game genre.Precepts™ is finally here to change that!



Unprecedented
Bible Experience!

Precepts™ offers players a gamified Bible experience that makes the routine of Bible reading fun and interesting. This newly invented Bible game is inspired by the thought of taking the Bible to the place of interest of youths – games.
Precepts™ is officially the Bible’s Game version! Technically speaking, the premise for the Precepts™ game design is that the challenge of attempting to spell Bible words with letter tiles drawn randomly brings to players’ memory Scripture passages that had previously been read. 

The Design of Precepts™ game environment is truly inspired by the Holy Book!









The First-ever Gospel Sport is Evolving!
Ultimately the goal of this unconventional ministry is the evolution of a novel brand of gospel sport, very similar to the Scrabble Championship that will stimulate and sustain the study of the Bible and help participants to grow in the faith. Find below pictures from a pilot competition – The Precepts™ Maestro’s Treasure Hunt held 2013 in Lagos Nigeria, with the collaboration of the Christian Broadcasting Network CBN engaging 16 Teens Churches in the first-ever Bible Knowledge Competition using Precepts™ to test their Bible intelligence. 







The New Precepts™ App.
The concept of the Bible in a game genre received commendation from my friends at its conception and continued support and encouragement through the 6 years of developing the idea and eventual efforts to bring the game to the public. The current version of Precepts™ Crossword Puzzle is a physical box with card-bound board and game pieces.

Pursuant to the intention of taking God’s word to the place of interest of game lovers, developing the electronic version of the game – Precepts™ App – became necessary. This is to make the game accessible to a global audience. The campaign on Indiegogo is to enable friends, family and members of the public who subscribe to the cause contribute towards the actualization of the Precepts™ App project.
In a world that has gone largely digital, a board game in a physical box is obviously out of tune with current trend. The physical board will still be available though, for those who prefer the traditional card-bound board game with game pieces.
The new Precepts™ App will offer lovers of God’s word the opportunity to stay connected to the Bible wherever they are. Precepts™ App will be made available FREE in mobile platforms such as iPhone, iPad, Windows phone and tablet Android phone and tablet.






What We Need & What You GetChange is possible with one person alone! And that one person is YOU! We request your support to raise the funds required to make us continue the awesome work we have started. We’ve spent several months and thousands of dollars working on Precepts™ to get it to a fully functional game in the physical but we need to do more. We are already working on  the apps which promises to be an even more awesome gaming and Bible learning experience. Your support and funding helps us make the various apps (Web,Windows,Android,iOS and Facebook) a reality.  See breakdown chart below.As our backer, you get early access to the app. This isn’t just a Bible learning platform or app. It’s a movement. We are people-powered. We are counting on you. Together we win! The Chart below illustrates the financial requirements to fully develop the four versions of the Precepts™ app. Precepts™ App pilot project is estimated at $50,000 USD. Despite limiting circumstances, we’ve come this far in advancing this cause. If we could afford to fund this project, you probably might have been getting an invite to play Precepts™ App. We could really use some help to make the Precepts™ App a reality.Precepts™ App Project is estimated at $50,000 USD. These are the present needs of the project.1. AppBuilding ($32,000) – Developing and porting App to mobile app stores (finished App will be ported to 4 platforms – iOS (phone & ipad), Windows (phone & tablet), Android (phone & tablet) and Web version).2. Game Design Interface ($8,000) – Setting up office to interface with developer’s dashboard. Also monitoring process and tracking the progress of the project through the period of building the app (this includes equipments and Internet Service for Home team collaboration).3. story:
MySquad, a professional airsoft network ever developed, specifically designed for airsoft lovers.

A web platform and mobile App that will allow you to find friends who share your passion, to build your team, to set up games and to share them with your team mates, to create proper tournaments, to update game profiles, to post videos, photos and to share them on the wall, to discover and comment on all the latest news on the market, and last but not least, to climb up the world rankings of the best Airsoft players!. 

     

           


                              

Transfer maps on your smart phone, the game objectives, defined strategies and the count-down, view your position and your team mates coordinates, communicate with them on a reserved channel, notify your status and view the status of the eliminated opponents.


                                  

Look for and sign up to open games, view the battle fields and clubs in your area, search for individual players or teams to set up your tournaments.

Share your game or the game you would like to play in with your Facebook friends, Google + or Twitter.

Set up your game on MySquad and manage in an easy and efficient way all registrations, communications and necessary information.

Keep yourself up to date on the latest news, on the club activities and the equipment and share and discuss your experiences on the wall!


   

Build up your team with your friends, organize together with them your game, creating and sharing maps and game strategies.

You will be able to view or upload detailed maps, define more objectives and strategies, share them and download them on your smartphone.

You will be able to choose whether to organize private or public games, how many soldiers will be able to sign up and to manage realtime all the information on the game. Notifications will always be available directly on your smartphone!

    

Publish your profile, update your equipment, your game statistics and your MySquad ranking; study those of your opponents and evaluate the reliability of your team mates. 

Game statistics will be updated on the base of the game results (whereas MySquad rankings will be calculated based on your game performances and the evaluation of your teammates and opponents).

 In your profile page you will be able to publish and share your photos and videos, to post on your Wall and to impress your opponents!

    

Climb up the MySquad rankings, view the world rankings, those of your region and those of your team. Every month, the best players and the best teams will receive an award by MySquad headquarter on the main public page.

                                    

Recall your objectives on your smartphone and view the guidelines/instructions on the mobile map. You will be able to GPS coordinates and those of your teammates, and to decide with them to follow the planned strategy and view all the details of the battle field.

                              

Select your status so that all your teammates are updated in real time on the field. Use MySquad App – Command Radio to communicate with your team in the Walkie-Talkie group modality. Connect the Bluetooth earpiece and activate or deactivate radio communication with just a click.

                                           

                         

                                 

We decided to add two extra development phases to bring MySquad to a wearable modality. Should we reach our first goal (65.000$) we will have the chance to work on the interface implementation for a SmartWatch so that Location, Objective, Compass, Status and Alerts will be directly available on your wrist.

Should we reach our second goal (85.000$) an Augmented Reality (AR) interface will be developed and you will be able to view all the details and the info related to the game in Real-time, while you frame the environment with your Smartphone, or while you move your gaze, directly on your eyes, through Smart Glasses!

In Augmented Reality your entertainment experience will totally addictive!

                                      

If you are a Club or an association you will be able to use MySquad to manage in an automated way your reservations and plan Games and Tournaments through a control panel dedicated to Clubs and to your customized Page within the Platform. You will be able to sponsor your activities, organize challenges and promote your events in the MySquad Community.

View more information on the functions dedicated to the Clubs on the page www.mysquad.website

                                                    


                                            Italian                         Spanish

                                    

                                             German                     French


                                    


                                                               

This is our development timeline. All our supporters will receive updates and previews each month!

                                                      

We have been working for months to analyze and collect the necessary information to develop the first web portal, integrated with Mobile App able to bring together all players needs and AirSoft lovers.

Our young IT company took on a professionals team of AirSoft and Reenacting experts, who provided their contributions and indispensable knowledge to develop the architecture of MySquad. But the development does not stop here; participants to the campaign will have a chance to attend the Beta phases and provide useful suggestions to ultimately enhance the final release.

All the information that will get to MySquad Community will help us in the future to develop new features to make all your game experiences absolutely unique!

                                                 

We are committed to create a quality product, that gives AirSoft lovers a new equipment and that supports them with the organization activities and games and challenges management, that provides detailed guidelines on the field and that makes game experiences unique. This might cause little delays on the defined timeline,  but our priority is to provide a fully complete and completely reliable tool! We will do our very best to keep up with the defined development roadmap and you will always be informed in real-time about further implementations and the release date.

                   

If you cannot help us monetarily you can still help us to reach this amazing goal by sharing this campaign with your friends on Facebook, Twitter and Google+. Your contribution is very precious to us and we really appreciate it!

                   

Please let us know if you have any questions, comments or suggestions! Even during this crowdfunding phase we really need your support to improve our project even more!

              

                                        

Airsoft is a sport in which participants eliminate opponents by hitting each other with spherical non-metallic pellets launched via replica firearms called Airsoft guns. It 'played by teams that run into different types of game; every  games are setting by participant before it start.

Airsoft Statistics

story:
Wer wir sind und warum wir tun was wir tun.

Wir die IaSfC (Innovative appSolution for Companys) sind ein in 2015 gegründetes Startup Unternehmen. Das Gründungsteam besteht aus zwei ehemaligen Games Programming Studenten und einem Executive Master of Business Administration(Inhaber). Aus unserer Leidenschaft für Spiele und programmieren, haben wir es uns zur Aufgabe gemacht, Spiele zu entwickeln mit:

- sauberen, simplen und für jeden leicht verständlichen Mechaniken, egal ob auf Mobilen Geräten oder High End Rechnern.

- anspruchsvolle und komplexen Mechaniken und Spielhandlungen. Tiefgreifenden Storys und dynamischen Welten.

Who we are and what`s our intentions.

We, the IaSfC (Innovative appSolution for Companies), are a startup founded in 2015. Our founders comprises 2 former Games Programming students and an Executive Master of Business Adminstration (owner). Out of passion for gaming and programming we set ourselves the objective to develop games with:

- clean, simple and easily comprehensible mechanics, be it on mobile devices or high end PCs.

- challenging and complex mechanics, deep stories and dynamic worlds.


Kurzbeschreibung des Spiels.

„Dungeon Slayer“ ist ein Mittelalter Fantasy Hack and Slay in der Iso-Perspektive. Gesteuert wird mit den Tasten WASD oder einem angeschlossenem Gamepad Controller. Auf Tabletts wird mit einem virtuellem Joystick gespielt.

In “Dungeon Slayer” muss der Spieler seinen Charakter durch verschiedene Dungeons steuern. Auf seinem Weg durch die Dungeons trifft er auf unterschiedliche Gegnertypen und muss diese bekämpfen. Je nach Schwierigkeitsgrad, welchen der Spieler selber einstellen kann, erhöhen oder verringern sich die Schwierigkeitsgrade der einzelnen Dungeons. Dies erfolgt in prozentualen Schritten je nach Einstellung.

Das Spiel besteht aus mehreren „Akten“. Jeder Akt hat vier normale Dungeon Level und ein Endboss Level. Der Spieler muss jeden Dungeon der Reihe nach durcharbeiten um in den Endboss Dungeon zu kommen. Erst wenn der Endboss bezwungen wurde, schaltet sich der nächste Akt frei.

Die einzelnen Dungeons können nach Abschluss immer wieder wiederholt werden.

Der Spieler steuert in Iso-Perspektive auf Windows Geräten seinen Charakter mit der Maus und Tastatur oder mit dem Gamepad. Auf Android Geräten und Tablets steuert der Spieler mit einem virtuellen Controller.

Specification:

"Dungeon Slayer" is a Hack and Slay game in a medieval fantasy setting. From an isometric point of view, you can control your character using standard hotkeys like WASD or a connected gamepad. A virtual joystick is used on tablet platforms.

In "Dungeon Slayer" the player has to guide his charactor through various dungeons. On his way he encounters various types of enemies he has to fight. Depending on the difficulty setting, which can be configured by the player, the dungeons become more demanding. The difficulty can be set on a percentage basis.  

The game features of multiple "acts". Each act consists of four conventional dungeon levels and a single endboss level, which can be reached by completing the preceding levels. The next act unlocks once the endboss of the previous act is defeated.

Of course, every single dungeon can be repeated after finishing them once.



Warum Dungeon Slayer?

Als unser erstes größeres Projekt, haben wir uns für dieses Spiel entschieden, da es eine leicht verständliche Mechanik hat und - aus unserer Sicht - auf längere Zeit gesehen der Spaßfaktor erhalten bleibt. 

Das Spiel ist sowohl für zwischendurch wie auch für längere Sessions geeignet. Es läuft auf Mobilen Geräten und auf allen Windows PC`s.

Durch verschiedene Highscores, Ladder Systeme und den Errungenschaften im Spiel, bieten wir dem Spieler ein gutes und langes Spielerlebnis.

Why Dungeon Slayer?

 Being our first larger project we decided on this game because of its simple mechanics and a, from our perspective, lasting fun factor.

The game is suitable for both, short and long sessions and runs on mobile devices and all Windows PCs.

Various highscores, ladder systems and in-game achievements we provide a fun and lasting experience.

Was bekommst du für dein Geld? 

Wir könnten jetzt sagen du bekommst DAS Mega Game. Das Spiel des Jahres, einen mega Trippel A Titel den es so noch nie gab.

Aber das wäre gelogen. Was du hier bekommst ist viel Besser. Du bekommst unser erstes Spiel als einer der Ersten. Du kannst in der Entwicklungsphase bereits an diesem Spiel teilnehmen und es durch deine Meinung verbessern. Als Spieler kannst du Bugs Reporten die in der nächsten Versionen entfernt werden. Du kannst Vorschläge unterbreiten wenn dir etwas nicht gefällt oder nicht ganz stimmig ist. DU siehst das Spiel vom Grundstein (Alpha Phase) bis zum Release in allen Versionen (als Alpha Tester). Du bist teil dieses Spiels und der Community.

Aber wofür benötigen wir das Ganze Geld fragst du dich jetzt sicherlich. Dass können wir dir schnell und einfach erklären.

  • 6000,00 Euro schlucken die Lizenzkosten.
  • 4000, 00 Euro gehen für 3D Modelle und 2D Grafiken drauf.
  • 3000,00 Euro kommen auf Sounds und Musik.
  • 1000,00 Euro werden für den Grundaufbau der Homepage, Server und Infrastruktur der Datenbankserver verwendet.
  • 1000,00 Euro als Backup für eventuelle Ausfälle oder zusätzliches Equipment.
Der Beginn der Entwicklung ist nicht erst nach dem Ende der Kampagne. Wir starten ca. eine Wochen nach Kampagnen Start mit der Entwicklung unseres Spiels. In dieser Woche werden wir noch die letzten Systeme fertig einrichten und auf die Produktionsumgebung anpassen.

What do you get for your money? 

We would be able to say you receive that Mega Game. The game of the year or a game you have never been seen before. 

But that would be not true. What you will get here is much better. You get our first game as one of the first. You can already participate in this game in the development phase and change it through your opinion. As you can player brace reports which become remote in versions nearest to that. You can submit propositions if you do not like something or is not very consistent. You see the game from the beginning (alpha stage) up to release in all versions (as alpha testers). You are a part of this game and the community.

But for what we need the money? - ask you certainly. We can explain fast and simply 

6000,00 Euro for licence costs

4000, 00 Euro for 3D models and 2D graphics

3000,00 Euro for sounds and music

1000,00 Euro for the basic configuration of the home page, server and infrastructure of the database servers.

1000,00 Euro as a backup for possible failure rates or additional equipment.

The beginning of the evolution is not only after the end of the campaign. We start approx. one weeks with the evolution after of our game campaign getting started.In this week, we will still arrange the last systems installations and adapt them into the production invornment.


Die Folgen von niedrigerem oder höherem Budget.

Auch bei niedrigerem Budget werden wir alles daran tun das Projekt zu realisieren. Lediglich die Entwicklungszeit wird sich dadurch verlängern, nicht aber die Qualität.

Sollten wir mehr als das Benötigte Startkapital von 15.000,00 Euro bekommen, werden wir das Spiel direkt weiter entwickeln und Neuerungen entwickeln, ohne einer längeren Wartezeit, nach dem Release. Auch werden wir, was die Qualität angeht, noch eins drauf legen. Insbesondere bei der Musik, den Sounds oder den 3D Modellen.

Jeder Euro den wir mehr bekommen, wird direkt in das Spiel und die Infrastruktur gesteckt, um es noch besser für euch Spieler zu machen.

Sollten wir eine Budget von 50.000,00 Euro erreichen, werden wir eine vierte Plattform mit ins Boot nehmen. iOS Entwicklung ist durch Apple und seine Preispolitik sehr teuer. Hier müssten wir erst die komplette Hardware anschaffen sowie weitere Software zur Entwicklung.

The results of lower or higher budget

In case of a lower income, we will do everything to finalize the project. Only the term  of development will takes more time - but not our quality.

If we get more than a start capital of 15.000,00 Euro we will further develop with more features. Then we push up the quality. Particular in the qualtity of the music, the sounds or the 3D models.

Every Euro that we get more  is been invested directly in the game and the infrastructure in order to make it even better for you players.

If we get 50.000,00 Euro, we open the fourth platform. iOS evolution is very expensive through Apple and its price policy. Therefore we would have to by the complete equipment as well as the software for the development.


Die größten Herausforderungen für uns

Als größte Herausforderung sehen wir das Cloudsystem, dass es euch ermöglicht - sofern ihr auf mehreren Plattformen unser Spiel spielt -  eure gespeicherten Spielstände zu übertragen. Weiterhin ist die KI und das Netzwerk Modul eine Große Herausforderung. Allerdings haben für alle drei Bereiche einen Spezialisten. Unser Programmierer ist spezialisiert auf Netzwerkprogrammierung und unser Lead Programmierer auf Algorithmik und KI.

Bei erreichen der 50.000,00 Euro, wird es eine Herausforderung, alle Systeme auf iOS Kompatibilität zu portieren. Das ist selbst für uns Neuland aber eine Herausforderung, die wir mit Freude annehmen.

Our biggest challenges 

For us the biggest challenge is the cloud system which allows the player to transfer his saved games to multiple platforms if he chooses to do so. Furthermore, AI and the network module are major challenges. However, one of our programmers is specialized in network programming and another one in algorithms and artificial intelligence to meet these challenges.

Once we reach a funding milestone of 50,000 Euro we will face the 
challenge of porting the game's systems for iOS compatability. This is 
new ground for all of us but we will gladly take this challenge.


Wie könnt Ihr uns sonst noch helfen?

Wenn ihr uns nicht finanziell unterstützen könnt, ist das nicht tragisch. Wir freuen uns auch sehr darüber, wenn ihr einfach nur ein wenig Werbung für uns macht. Verlinkt unser Projekt auf Facebook, Twitter Google+ und in Foren in denen ihr unterwegs seid. Verwendet das Indiegogo Tool wo es geht. Ansonsten nehmt den Link. Auch für die Leute die uns nicht finanziell unterstützen können, werden wir uns eine Kleinigkeit einfallen lassen, um unsere Dankbarkeit zu zeigen.

You also can support us.....

There is no problem if you can`t support us financially.We are also very pleased if you only make a little advertising for us like Google, link our project on Facebook, Google+, Twitter and in forums in which you are. Use the Indiegogo tool whereever you goe. Otherwise take the Indiegogo link. Even for the people who are not able to support us financially, we will thinking about, that you will get a little present to show you our thankfulness.
story_txt:
Wer wir sind und warum wir tun was wir tun.
Wir die IaSfC (Innovative appSolution for Companys) sind ein in 2015 gegründetes Startup Unternehmen. Das Gründungsteam besteht aus zwei ehemaligen Games Programming Studenten und einem Executive Master of Business Administration(Inhaber). Aus unserer Leidenschaft für Spiele und programmieren, haben wir es uns zur Aufgabe gemacht, Spiele zu entwickeln mit:
- sauberen, simplen und für jeden leicht verständlichen Mechaniken, egal ob auf Mobilen Geräten oder High End Rechnern.- anspruchsvolle und komplexen Mechaniken und
Spielhandlungen. Tiefgreifenden Storys und dynamischen Welten.
Who we are and what`s our intentions.
We, the IaSfC (Innovative appSolution for Companies), are a startup founded in 2015. Our founders comprises 2 former Games Programming students and an Executive Master of Business Adminstration (owner). Out of passion for gaming and programming we set ourselves the objective to develop games with:

- clean, simple and easily comprehensible mechanics, be it on mobile devices or high end PCs.
- challenging and complex mechanics, deep stories and dynamic worlds.


Kurzbeschreibung des Spiels.
 
„Dungeon Slayer“ ist ein Mittelalter
Fantasy Hack and Slay in der Iso-Perspektive. Gesteuert wird mit den Tasten
WASD oder einem angeschlossenem Gamepad Controller. Auf Tabletts wird mit einem
virtuellem Joystick gespielt.
In “Dungeon Slayer” muss der Spieler
seinen Charakter durch verschiedene Dungeons steuern. Auf seinem Weg durch die
Dungeons trifft er auf unterschiedliche Gegnertypen und muss diese bekämpfen. Je
nach Schwierigkeitsgrad, welchen der Spieler selber einstellen kann, erhöhen
oder verringern sich die Schwierigkeitsgrade der einzelnen Dungeons. Dies
erfolgt in prozentualen Schritten je nach Einstellung.
Das Spiel besteht aus mehreren
„Akten“. Jeder Akt hat vier normale Dungeon Level und ein Endboss Level. Der
Spieler muss jeden Dungeon der Reihe nach durcharbeiten um in den Endboss
Dungeon zu kommen. Erst wenn der Endboss bezwungen wurde, schaltet sich der
nächste Akt frei.
Die einzelnen Dungeons können nach Abschluss
immer wieder wiederholt werden.

Der
Spieler steuert in Iso-Perspektive auf Windows Geräten seinen Charakter mit der
Maus und Tastatur oder mit dem Gamepad. Auf Android Geräten und Tablets steuert
der Spieler mit einem virtuellen Controller.

Specification:

"Dungeon Slayer" is a Hack and Slay game in a medieval fantasy setting. From an isometric point of view, you can control your character using standard hotkeys like WASD or a connected gamepad. A virtual joystick is used on tablet platforms.In "Dungeon Slayer" the player has to guide his charactor through various dungeons. On his way he encounters various types of enemies he has to fight. Depending on the difficulty setting, which can be configured by the player, the dungeons become more demanding. The difficulty can be set on a percentage basis.  
The game features of multiple "acts". Each act consists of four conventional dungeon levels and a single endboss level, which can be reached by completing the preceding levels. The next act unlocks once the endboss of the previous act is defeated.
Of course, every single dungeon can be repeated after finishing them once.




Warum Dungeon Slayer?

Als unser erstes größeres Projekt, haben wir uns für dieses Spiel entschieden, da es eine leicht verständliche Mechanik hat und - aus unserer Sicht - auf längere Zeit gesehen der Spaßfaktor erhalten bleibt. 
Das Spiel ist sowohl für zwischendurch wie auch für längere Sessions geeignet. Es läuft auf Mobilen Geräten und auf allen Windows PC`s.
Durch verschiedene Highscores, Ladder Systeme und den Errungenschaften im Spiel, bieten wir dem Spieler ein gutes und langes Spielerlebnis.

Why Dungeon Slayer?

 Being our first larger project we decided on this game because of its simple mechanics and a, from our perspective, lasting fun factor.
The game is suitable for both, short and long sessions and runs on mobile devices and all Windows PCs.
Various highscores, ladder systems and in-game achievements we provide a fun and lasting experience.


   Was bekommst du für dein Geld?  Wir könnten jetzt sagen du bekommst DAS Mega Game. Das Spiel des Jahres, einen mega Trippel A Titel den es so noch nie gab.
Aber das wäre gelogen. Was du hier bekommst ist viel Besser. Du bekommst unser erstes Spiel als einer der Ersten. Du kannst in der Entwicklungsphase bereits an diesem Spiel teilnehmen und es durch deine Meinung verbessern. Als Spieler kannst du Bugs Reporten die in der nächsten Versionen entfernt werden. Du kannst Vorschläge unterbreiten wenn dir etwas nicht gefällt oder nicht ganz stimmig ist. DU siehst das Spiel vom Grundstein (Alpha Phase) bis zum Release in allen Versionen (als Alpha Tester). Du bist teil dieses Spiels und der Community.
Aber wofür benötigen wir das Ganze Geld fragst du dich jetzt sicherlich. Dass können wir dir schnell und einfach erklären.


6000,00 Euro schlucken die Lizenzkosten.
4000, 00 Euro gehen für 3D Modelle und 2D Grafiken drauf.
3000,00 Euro kommen auf Sounds und Musik.
1000,00 Euro werden für den Grundaufbau der Homepage, Server und Infrastruktur der Datenbankserver verwendet.
1000,00 Euro als Backup für eventuelle Ausfälle oder zusätzliches Equipment.

Der Beginn der Entwicklung ist nicht erst nach dem Ende der Kampagne. Wir starten ca. eine Wochen nach Kampagnen Start mit der Entwicklung unseres Spiels. In dieser Woche werden wir noch die letzten Systeme fertig einrichten und auf die Produktionsumgebung anpassen.

What do you get for your money? 
We would be able to say you receive that Mega Game. The game of the year or a game you have never been seen before. 
But that would be not true. What you will get here is much better. You get our first game as one of the first. You can already participate in this game in the development phase and change it through your opinion. As you can player brace reports which become remote in versions nearest to that. You can submit propositions if you do not like something or is not very consistent. You see the game from the beginning (alpha stage) up to release in all versions (as alpha testers). You are a part of this game and the community.
But for what we need the money? - ask you certainly. We can explain fast and simply 
6000,00 Euro for licence costs
4000, 00 Euro for 3D models and 2D graphics
3000,00 Euro for sounds and music
1000,00 Euro for the basic configuration of the home page, server and infrastructure of the database servers.
1000,00 Euro as a backup for possible failure rates or additional equipment.
The beginning of the evolution is not only after the end of the campaign. We start approx. one weeks with the evolution after of our game campaign getting started.In this week, we will still arrange the last systems installations and adapt them into the production invornment.

   Die Folgen von niedrigerem oder höherem Budget. Auch bei niedrigerem Budget werden wir alles daran tun das Projekt zu realisieren. Lediglich die Entwicklungszeit wird sich dadurch verlängern, nicht aber die Qualität.
Sollten wir mehr als das Benötigte Startkapital von 15.000,00 Euro bekommen, werden wir das Spiel direkt weiter entwickeln und Neuerungen entwickeln, ohne einer längeren Wartezeit, nach dem Release. If we get 50.000,00 Euro, we open the fourth platform. iOS evolution is very expensive through Apple and its price policy. Therefore we would have to by the complete equipment as well as the software for the development.
   Die größten Herausforderungen für uns Als größte Herausforderung sehen wir das Cloudsystem, dass es euch ermöglicht - sofern ihr auf mehreren Plattformen unser Spiel spielt -  eure gespeicherten Spielstände zu übertragen. Furthermore, AI and the network module are major challenges. However, one of our programmers is specialized in network programming and another one in algorithms and artificial intelligence to meet these challenges.
Once we reach a funding milestone of 50,000 Euro we will face the challenge of porting the game's systems for iOS compatability. This is new ground for all of us but we will gladly take this challenge.


    Wie könnt Ihr uns sonst noch helfen? Wenn ihr uns nicht finanziell unterstützen könnt, ist das nicht tragisch. Wir freuen uns auch sehr darüber, wenn ihr einfach nur ein wenig Werbung für uns macht. Verlinkt unser Projekt auf Facebook, Twitter Google+ und in Foren in denen ihr unterwegs seid. Verwendet das Indiegogo Tool wo es geht. Ansonsten nehmt den Link. Auch für die Leute die uns nicht finanziell unterstützen können, werden wir uns eine Kleinigkeit einfallen lassen, um unsere Dankbarkeit zu zeigen.

You also can support us.....
There is no problem if you can`t support us financially.We are also very pleased if you only make a little advertising for us like Google, link our project on Facebook, Google+, Twitter and in forums in which you are. Use the Indiegogo tool whereever you goe. Otherwise take the Indiegogo link. Even for the people who are not able to support us financially, we will thinking about, that you will get a little present to show you our thankfulness.

story:
Help Us Raise $30,000 To Ship Our New Game!


Summary

We are currently in production of our new game Nerdtopia as our last attempt at staying in the ever-competitive game industry.  Over the years we've grown from a team of 2 to a team of 9.  We had projects lined up to develop games for bigger companies, but they all fell through for one reason or another.  So with our last remaining weeks & what's left in the bank,we decided to make a fun game based on the team & our attempts to build a successful business. 


What We Need & What You Get

We're looking for an additional $30,000 to allow us to finish production on the game and bring the product to market.  Every dollar we get in will go towards making payroll and extending our runway to continue production and updating the game.

We figured a fun way to offer people a treat in gratitude for supporting us, is to offer the opportunity to become a character in the game for all to enjoy.  Most of us have wanted to see ourselves as a cartoon or character in a story and we can give people that chance :)

The Impact

Your contribution will be key to our survival.  The company was started in New Brunswick Canada to create new opportunities for people in the region to be able to find jobs in the technology sector where the Eastern Provinces suffer from high unemployment and most college graduates end up moving to other provinces to find work.

We've been around for 4 years now and would like to continue to grow as he have from a team of 2 people to almost 10.  Over those years we've put out a number of games for iPhone and Android that can be found at www.erdsgames.com

Challenges

While making games may seem like a lot of fun and silliness, the business is incredibly competitive.  While a small team is able to distribute their products worldwide to a number of markets, that ability makes it incredibly more difficult to get people to know your product exists.  A 2 person team faces the same challenges as billion dollar companies.

We really value our team.  Even with only a few weeks left in the bank, we made the choice not to lay anyone off - which could have extended our runway for half the team for an extra month.  Instead, we felt we are all better as a team, where each persons abilities compliment the other very well and decided that we all "cross-the finish line together." 

We hope you will be a part of our "Final Fantasy" (those guys have a great story about being in a similar situation) and help us afford the opportunity to continue contributing to our community.

Here's a few pages we've put together so far for the Art Book that showcases the behind the scenes work that went into making the game:
