story:
Triple Threat Studios

 Hello everyone, my name is Kelby Bricker CEO at Triple Threat Studios. We are aiming to bring you one of the most compelling games from the past few years. The Dead Await us is an open world game, and you will be able to explore the entirety of downtown Manhattan. 

If you contribute to our project, when the games demo is done, you will receive a copy of it. To be yours forever. You will gain access to exclusive content that no one else will have. We are launching the game on steam green light, and the final product will be $29.99 

Background of me:

I started this company only 8 months ago, with absolutely 0 funds. I am completely self taught in this subject. That's the beauty of the internet isn't it? I grew up in the Chicago area, and I just moved back here awhile ago. 

Where Will Your Funds Go?

Your funds will go to the overall quality of the game. Due to the face that we are a very small team, we need funds to get the look and feel we desire for this project. A percentage of the funds will also go to getting us on steam green light. By contributing, think of yourself as part of our team. It is greatly appreciated!

Thank you very much for your contribution, ,

Kelby Bricker CEO of Triple Threat Studios

story:
Who we are

A couple of friends came together and tried to play a social in the same room that was fun, easy to use, didn't require a lot of waiting for our turn, and pieces couldn't get lost. So for the past year working with artist from all over, and mulling over the best logic we could conceive, GetPLayeD is less than 5 months from completion. It could be even sooner than that with your help!

  • The lead developer is Tchaikawsky Samuels- A former US Marine and software developer. He has one other app on the market (Pistol Instructor Marksmanship Program 2 a.k.a. PIMP2)  that he created while serving as a marksmanship instructor in Quantico, Virginia. The rest of the team are all close friends and family that have already put in thousands of hours combined over the past year to getting the game where it is now.
  • We (the team developing the app that's us in the image! Hi!) love having senseless fun! But when looking for games to play they were either pointless or time consuming to setup. Even outright boring or too senseless (like, lower your IQ senseless) to play. 
  • So we started on an epic journey imagining what the perfect game would be like. A game that gives you what you want, make you and everyone happy, get to know you and the people you hang out with, and when played together offers an amazing experience that would keep us coming back for more. 
  • Sooooooo..... we came up with over 900 things that we love to all do together and some crazier things that we would like to do if the stars were aligned with a special someone. Then painstakingly worked out the logic for not letting a bunch of time go before it's a single player's turn again, by intelligently picking other players to share their turn with.  Finally we considered that what some people think is crazy other may think is boring so we figured out a way to break the game up into different "difficulty" levels :) Finally The name GetPLayeD, why not have a game that knows more than the players and their desires and fears? Then have it use all that information to coordinate the most amazing time ever. The more you play the better your experience gets. That where our secret sauce comes in so it not just random silly things that someone would have done, just not that person that happened to get it. Whaalaaa. after  a few dry runs playing an excel based version we found ourselves hooked as we replaced lame task and introduced new ones, For drinkers the A.I. will do its very best to keep you and the rest of your drinking buddies "in the zone" not tired or throwing up :/ Young Adult Tested & Even mother approved we can't wait to share hat we have with everyone.
  • So if we are so close, why do we need your help? Because it's really expensive to afford a server, paying artist, developers, software licenses, musicians, lawyers, copyrights, and the list goes on and on. We are tapping into the fun loving community out there to help bring this masterpiece in the making to real whole world. So please pick one of the options below...

What We Need & What You Get

Breaking it down:

  • 100% of the funds raised are going to our app and website developers
  • Paying for the server that will host the game rooms,
  • Paying the lawyer that will keep us safe from crazy people that can't accept responsibility for their own actions
  • Paying the artist that are doing an amazing job and wrapping up all of the concept art needed to commit to the finals.
  • There is also likely a few hurdles that we are sure to run into because even the best plan isn't perfect.
  • Inside of the game we use credits to monetize it. For contributing to this fundraiser you will receive up to 10x the number of credits you would have otherwise received by buying them in the game. Just make sure to sign up with the same e-mail address that you use to identify yourself with INDIEGOGO.  If that fails, fear not. You can always e-mail us at admin@GetPLayedApp.com so we can resolve whatever issues.
  • One other perk! As we tweak and create a fully functioning version in excel, we will share an Excel based beta versions with some of you :) It's like you're part of our team so we may as well treat you like a team member.
  • If we do not reach our entire goal the funds will cover whatever portion of the development cost they can. We planned on doing it alone and are committed to its completion no matter what.

The Impact

Your contribution helps bring our product to the market sooner. It will be submitted to the Apple, Android, Windows, and Blackberry market. We will even make a web based version.

  • The role we all play is contributing to having fun with friends and our mobile device in the same room!!!!! Mind blowing. No one has to act busy on their fun anymore. They are busy, with everyone in the room :)
  • The lead developer made (Pistol Instructor Marksmanship Program 2 a.k.a. PIMP2) on his down time while serving on active duty working, and going to school full time, while raising 3 kids. Now as a civilian with a 9-5, he's got this.
  • I guess we are doing this all with the hope that the pastime of board games can be reinvented. We want to say goodbye to our phones being a distraction during quality time, yet instead an outlet to one heck of a good time :)

Risks & Challenges

There are a few hurdles being faced. Such as hiring the right developers, completing the insane logic necessary to manage all the variables in play that has made it take so long to get to this point. 

  • We have been and will continue to solve the math and logic problems that stand in our way. Tchaikawsky is a Lean Six Sigma Black Belt (fancy way of saying, "really good at using statistics to make things work well"). He is a developer. He studied art for a year at the Art Institute of Washington and was a Marine that partied in Japan and NYC for his excusable 20's. If there was ever a man suited for managing and contributing to the talent necessary to make this happen, He is our man. Likewise, the team as shown artistically in the image above is diverse and fun loving. We have a lot of new and interesting challenges planned for everyone.
  • We have a logic tree that list all of the task we have left to complete. If there comes an issue too difficult for anyone to solve we hire help using freelancers and contractors.

Other Ways You Can Help

For some of you that can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please share a link to our website www.GetPLayeDApp.com having the newest product on the market has a host of its own challenges. We have to build up a reputation and a brand. With your single act of sharing, it can have exponential results! 
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools! We can't wait to share this experience with all of you.

And that's all there is to it.

Then have it use all that information to coordinate the most amazing time ever. The more you play the better your experience gets. That where our secret sauce comes in so it not just random silly things that someone would have done, just not that person that happened to get it. Whaalaaa. after  a few dry runs playing an excel based version we found ourselves hooked as we replaced lame task and introduced new ones, For drinkers the A.I. will do its very best to keep you and the rest of your drinking buddies "in the zone" not tired or throwing up :/ Young Adult Tested & Even mother approved we can't wait to share hat we have with everyone. So if we are so close, why do we need your help? Because it's really expensive to afford a server, paying artist, developers, software licenses, musicians, lawyers, copyrights, and the list goes on and on. We are tapping into the fun loving community out there to help bring this masterpiece in the making to real whole world. So please pick one of the options below...
   What We Need & What You Get Breaking it down:  100% of the funds raised are going to our app and website developers
Paying for the server that will host the game rooms,
Paying the lawyer that will keep us safe from crazy people that can't accept responsibility for their own actions
Paying the artist that are doing an amazing job and wrapping up all of the concept art needed to commit to the finals.
There is also likely a few hurdles that we are sure to run into because even the best plan isn't perfect. Inside of the game we use credits to monetize it. For contributing to this fundraiser you will receive up to 10x the number of credits you would have otherwise received by buying them in the game. Just make sure to sign up with the same e-mail address that you use to identify yourself with INDIEGOGO.  If that fails, fear not. You can always e-mail us at admin@GetPLayedApp.com so we can resolve whatever issues.
One other perk! As we tweak and create a fully functioning version in excel, we will share an Excel based beta versions with some of you :) It's like you're part of our team so we may as well treat you like a team member. If we do not reach our entire goal the funds will cover whatever portion of the development cost they can. We planned on doing it alone and are committed to its completion no matter what.    The Impact Your contribution helps bring our product to the market sooner. It will be submitted to the Apple, Android, Windows, and Blackberry market. We will even make a web based version.  The role we all play is contributing to having fun with friends and our mobile device in the same room!!!!! Mind blowing. No one has to act busy on their fun anymore. They are busy, with everyone in the room :) The lead developer made (Pistol Instructor Marksmanship Program 2 a.k.a. PIMP2) on his down time while serving on active duty working, and going to school full time, while raising 3 kids. Now as a civilian with a 9-5, he's got this. I guess we are doing this all with the hope that the pastime of board games can be reinvented. We want to say goodbye to our phones being a distraction during quality time, yet instead an outlet to one heck of a good time :)    Risks & Challenges  There are a few hurdles being faced. Such as hiring the right developers, completing the insane logic necessary to manage all the variables in play that has made it take so long to get to this point.   We have been and will continue to solve the math and logic problems that stand in our way. Tchaikawsky is a Lean Six Sigma Black Belt (fancy way of saying, "really good at using statistics to make things work well"). He is a developer. He studied art for a year at the Art Institute of Washington and was a Marine that partied in Japan and NYC for his excusable 20's. If there was ever a man suited for managing and contributing to the talent necessary to make this happen, He is our man. Likewise, the team as shown artistically in the image above is diverse and fun loving. We have a lot of new and interesting challenges planned for everyone. We have a logic tree that list all of the task we have left to complete. If there comes an issue too difficult for anyone to solve we hire help using freelancers and contractors.    Other Ways You Can Help For some of you that can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:  Please share a link to our website www.GetPLayeDApp.com having the newest product on the market has a host of its own challenges. We have to build up a reputation and a brand. With your single act of sharing, it can have exponential results!  Please use the Indiegogo share tools! We can't wait to share this experience with all of you.   And that's all there is to it.

story:
We have one French Part and One English part.

Nous avons une partie des explications en francais et Anglais.



ENGLISH PART/PARTIE ANGLAISE

Brief summary


Hi  :)

As some people knows Blablatopia begins to spread more and more. But this cannot be without your help. Currently the Blablatopia set is available on PC, MAC download. And Android only as an application. With + 5000 members register in just 5 months of existence, and more than a hundred active players per day. What makes Blablatopia a game both assets on the site than on the game. More 2 Applications in the spirit of the world of Blablatopia are available on the store for Android only. We are a team of 2 designers, 1 supervisor, 1 Community Manager, 1 Youtubeur. We participate actively on the site, play and social networks under the fictional characters Kingbird and Lordbird. We still have many projects for the world of blablatopia. And here is one to which one needs your help! :)


What we need and what you get project:


Putting Blablatopia and the auxiliar games for Ios(Iphone & Tablette) we need a minimum of 1500 Euros or $ 2100 Canadian. Why? We do not work on MAC, and to be able to convert our games for Ios, we must buy a MAC. This mac will be only accessible to Blablatopia and his community. And we have to pay Apple an amount of EUR 100 per year minimum to be able to develop applications on the Store. Each person wanting to offer its assistance to the community of Blablatopia, will be offer a Bonus in the game according to his gift and his nickname in the acknowledgments of the site to contribute to this project. If we do not reach the objective, the total amount will go in the communication of the game through ads on social networks to end to publicize the game. And why not make posters/flyers with which all members could the dispatcher throughout their city? :)


 The impact


Why Iphone and Tablet? + 70% of the people on Earth have Iphones and or Tablet ios. So we can reach + world for having the best community :) Some members of Blablatopia would like to have access to the game on their Iphone and Tablet ios.


Risks and challenges


during the game and applications to ios, transfers might be that bugs will be forthcoming. We will manage to solve them, as we have managed to make a playable game in very short time :D


Other ways to help


we understand completely that some people cannot help us :) What you could do is: share the link of this gift through your facebook pages and your homies :)


See you soon on Blablatopia! Team`s Blablatopia!


FRENCH PART/PARTIE FRANCAISE

Bref résumé

Salut à tous :)

Vous fans de Blablatopia où bientôt Fan. Comme vous le savez Blablatopia commence à s'étendre de plus en plus. Mais cela ne se pourra sans votre aide.

Actuellement le jeu de Blablatopia est disponible sur PC, MAC en téléchargement. Et Android uniquement sous forme d'application.

Avec + de 5 000 Membres inscris en à peine 5 mois d'existence, et plus d'une centaine de joueurs actifs par jour. Ce qui fait de Blablatopia un jeu Actif aussi bien sur le site que sur le jeu.

De plus 2 Applications dans l'esprit du monde de Blablatopia sont disponible sur le store pour Android uniquement.

Nous sommes une équipe de 2 Créateurs, 1 Superviseur, 1 Community Manager, 1 Youtubeur. Nous participons activement sur le site, le jeu et les réseaux sociaux sous les personnages fictifs Kingbird et Lordbird.

Nous avons encore beaucoup de projets pour l'univers de blablatopia. Et en voici un, auquel on a besoin de votre aide ! :)

Ce dont nous avons besoin et ce que vous obtenez

Projet : Mettre Blablatopia et ses jeux pour Ios(Iphone & Tablette)

  • Nous avons besoin d'un minimum de 1500 Euros soit 2100$Canadien.
  • Pourquoi ? Nous ne travaillons pas sur MAC, et pour pouvoir convertir nos jeux pour Ios, nous devons acheter un MAC(Comme vous le savez, les macs ne sont pas donnés...). Ce mac sera uniquement accessible à Blablatopia et sa communauté. Et nous devons payer Apple un montant de 100 Euros par an minimum pour pouvoir mettre les applications sur le Store.
  • Chaque personne voulant offrir son aide à la Communauté de Blablatopia, se verra offrir un Bonus dans le jeu selon son Don et son Pseudo dans les remerciements du site pour avoir contribuer à ce projet.
  • Si nous n'atteignons pas l'objectif, la somme total ira dans la communication du jeu à travers des publicités sur les réseaux sociaux à fin de faire connaître le jeu. Et pourquoi pas faire des affiches/flyers avec lesquels tout les membres pourraient les dispatcher un peu partout dans leur ville ? :)

L'impact

Pourquoi Iphone et Tablette ?

  • +70% des gens sur Terre ont des Iphones et ou Tablette ios. Donc on pourra atteindre + de monde pour avoir la meilleure communauté :)
  • Certains membres de Blablatopia voudraient avoir accès au jeu sur leur Iphone et Tablette ios.

Risques et défis

  • Durant les transfers du jeu et des applications vers ios, il se pourrait que des bugs se fassent paraître.
  • Nous réussirons à les résoudre, comme nous avons réussi à faire un jeu jouable en très peu de temps :D

D'autres façons d'aider

On comprend tout à fait que certaines personnes ne puissent pas nous aider :) Ce que vous pourriez faire est de :

  • Partagez le lien de ce DON à travers vos pages facebook et vos potes :)

Et le tour est joué!!!

A bientôt sur Blablatopia !
L'équipe Blablatopia  !

story:
Magnetizing an entire army can be a slow and painful process, so much so that many wargamers simply don't do it at all. But they would still like to have their miniatures magnetized. Many of you have probably been searching for a simple solution, some of you have just struggled through. But take heart, because we have recently developed a solution that allows for the convenient and fast magnetization of your miniatures. The entire process only consists of putting your miniature on a scenic base and placing it on a movement tray. It's that fast and easy! It doesn't get simpler than that!

Should you also be convinced of the necessity for such an innovative magnetization system, then you can choose from several different backing options. You can find additional details and information about this project here on this site. Together with your support we will be able to provide a wide variety of scenic bases, further improving the overall quality of our hobby.

We would also like to show our support for the 9th Age project by creating scenic bases specific for the different factions.

500€ - Ancient Palace series (general)- currently being in production

1 000€ - Sand stone series (Ogers Khans) - Prototype


1 500€ - Dead man's desert series (Undying Dynasties)- Prototype


2 000€ - Jungle tiles series(Saurian Ancients)- Prototype

2 500€ - Chaos wastelands series(Warriors of the Dark Gods) - Prototype

3 000€ - Fields of Equitaine series(Kingdom of Equitaine) - waiting for design
3 500€ - Elven roads series(Highborn Elves) - waiting for design
4 000€ - Dwarven holds series(Dwarven Holds) - waiting for design
4 500€ - Infernal pathway series(Infernal Dwarves) - waiting for design
5 000€ - Mystic forest series(Sylvan Elves) - waiting for design
5 500€ - Hunting grounds series(Beast Herds) - waiting for design
6 000€ - Land of the dead series(Vampire Covenant) - waiting for design
6 500€ - Dreaded lands series(Dread Elves) - waiting for design
7 000€ - Demonic ground series(Daemon Legions) - waiting for design
7 500€ - Mushroom turf series(Orcs and Goblins) - waiting for design
8 000€ - Underground rubble series(Vermin Swarm) - waiting for design

Plain bases are added to offered to guaranteed items. 

Series consist of:
10 different 20x20mm bases for infantry (retail price 10€),
10 different 25x25mm bases for infantry (retail price 10€),
5 different 25x50mm bases for cavalry (retail price 10€), 
4 different 40x40mm bases for monstrous infantry (retail price 20€), 
2 different 50x50mm bases for monsters (retail price 10€),
2 different 50X75mm bases for monstrous cavalry (retail price 20€),
2 different 50x100mm bases for chariots and large monsters(retail price 20€),
2  60mm round for war machines (retail price 20€), 
2  75mm round for war machines (retail price 20€), 

Live call
You'll get an invitation to a live call I will be doing through social media, where I'm going to talk about the things we are doing and our plans, and you can ask questions and give feedback.

Your design
You'll get a chance to work with us to create a complete series of scenic bases, based upon your design. This new product could also carry your name or nickname, depending on your preference. For example: John's Infernal Pathway!

Meet the team
You'll get an invitation to meet the team at a night out in the beautiful city of Lublin, Poland. As you'll get to experience Slavic hospitality, we may also be able to squeeze in a friendly game ;).

Showing your support
If for any reason you can't or don't want to pledge, but you still want to support us, tell your friends about this project, post a link on your favourite forum. Join us on Facebook or register on our site. Mention us on Twitter. All of this would help.

What does TMS really stand for?

I have always loved our hobby, but more specifically: the community. The wargaming community is amazing and the people are awesome. The sheer diversity of people that get along is astonishing. I can go to any country in the world and find a wargaming community, I can be certain that I will meet interesting people, and I know I will have a good time, no matter our differences. The best example was during the last ETC in Prague, when Russia and the Ukraine were paired (two countries at war!). I was by the organisers desk and there was tension how this would turn out. I kept a keen eye on how things would unravel, glancing across the hall at them. Despite their differences and the animosities between their countries which they were representing, they were having fun and they were enjoying themselves, bonding over our hobby. If that isn't worth supporting, not much is. I have many more stories like this, and because of those I've dedicated the last 20 years of my life to popularising and growing the hobby. As time passes by I'm getting bolder, starting bigger and bigger projects. Always doing more, always working harder, as being a part of the community obligates me to improve. This is what TMS stands for. If you believe in the hobby, as we at TMS do, join us by supporting us in any way you can. Remember to tell your friends about this project, post a link on your favourite forum or join us on Facebook, register on our site, or mention us on Twitter.

Thank you for your support.


How the pledge value works:

Say you pledge 95€​, the value you get is 200€​. You mat take pledge offer, or you can choose 200€​ worth of items from the retail price list. This way you'll always get what you want.

Retail price list


Movement trays

Normal Tray - 100x40 - 2,50€
Normal Tray - 120x40 - 2,50€
Normal Tray - 125x50 - 2,50€
Normal Tray - 150x75 - 2,50€
Normal Tray - 125x100 - 4,50€
Normal Tray - 100x100 - 4,50€
Normal Tray - 120x120 - 4,50€
Normal Tray - 140x100 - 4,50€  
Normal Tray - 150x100 - 4,50€
Normal Tray - 200x75 - 4,50€
Normal Tray - 150x150 - 4,50€
Normal Tray - 250x100 - 6,00€
Normal Tray - 200x100 - 6,00€
Normal Tray - 200x150 - 6,00€

Magnetic Tray - 100x40 - 5,00€
Magnetic Tray - 120x40 - 5,00€
Magnetic Tray - 125x50 - 5,00€
Magnetic Tray - 150x75 - 5,00€
Magnetic Tray - 125x100 - 6,00€
Magnetic Tray - 100x100 - 6,00€
Magnetic Tray - 120x120 - 6,00€
Magnetic Tray - 140x100 - 8,00€  
Magnetic Tray - 150x100 - 8,00€
Magnetic Tray - 200x75 - 8,00€
Magnetic Tray - 150x150 - 8,00€
Magnetic Tray - 250x100 - 10,00€
Magnetic Tray - 200x100 - 10,00€
Magnetic Tray - 200x150 - 10,00€

Resin bases

15 - 20x20mm Plain resin bases for infantry (retail price 5€),
15 - 25x25mm Plain resin bases for infantry (retail price 5€),
10 - 20x20mm Normal resin bases for infantry (retail price 5€),
10 - 25x25mm Normal resin bases for infantry (retail price 5€),
5 - 25x50mm Normal resin bases for cavalry (retail price 5€), 
4 - 40x40mm Normal resin bases for monstrous infantry (retail price 10€), 
2 - 50x50mm Normal resin bases for monsters (retail price 5€),
2 - 50X75mm Normal resin bases for monstrous cavalry (retail price 10€),
2 - 50x100mm Normal resin bases for chariots and large monsters(retail price 10€),
2 - 60mm round Normal resin bases for war machines (retail price 10€), 
2 - 75mm round Normal resin bases for war machines (retail price 10€), 

15 - 20x20mm Magnetic Plain resin bases for infantry (retail price 10€),
15 - 25x25mm Magnetic Plain resin bases for infantry (retail price 10€),
10 - 20x20mm Magnetic bases for infantry (retail price 10€),
10 - 25x25mm Magnetic bases for infantry (retail price 10€),
5 - 25x50mm Magnetic bases for cavalry (retail price 10€), 
4 - 40x40mm Magnetic bases for monstrous infantry (retail price 20€), 
2 - 50x50mm Magnetic bases for monsters (retail price 10€),
2 - 50X75mm Magnetic bases for monstrous cavalry (retail price 20€),
2 - 50x100mm Magnetic bases for chariots and large monsters(retail price 20€),
2 - 60mm round Magnetic bases for war machines (retail price 20€).
2 - 75mm round Magnetic bases for war machines (retail price 20€).

Artur "Kanadian" Stasieńko
Cofounder of TMS.

P.S. I would like to thank the team of the-ninth-age.com for their work, help and assistance! Keep it up, you are doing an outstanding job!

* or any product from our magnetic tray system of equal value. In practice you take the value of the perk, and choose anything from the MTS offer.
** the one use promo code will be available till the end of the year.

Supplement and FAQ.

1.
The prototypes are mostly made, Even if we don't reach the minimum 2500, the bases will be made, and every one will receive their order. This is 100 % guaranteed. If we go over the 2500 then additional themes will be added, giving a wider variety of themes to choose from. The other themes will be made in the future, but they will not be available at such good terms, and the release time line will be undefined, as they will be done between other projects in spare time. And there are design your base perks available, each time one is purchased, additional themes will be available. That is a possibility of additional 10 themes, that can be made, no matter the circumstances.

2. Plain bases will be added to the selection as there has been demand for them, shortly we will choose the best option for supplying them, as we taken them under consideration before launching the campaign.

3.
60 mm, round bases have been added.

4,
As for 60x100 and 150x100 they will not be done for all themes. But army themes that have the need for those bases will have them included in the offer.

The other themes will be made in the future, but they will not be available at such good terms, and the release time line will be undefined, as they will be done between other projects in spare time. story:
GDC Gaming & Entertainment Ltd. (‘GDC’) is a privately owned corporation that creates exclusive content for different platforms focusing on the gaming industry (table games, video gaming, online gaming, casual gaming, slot machines, mobile gaming, lottery and more).

GDC, in a licensing partnership with David L. Hoyt (one of the World's top puzzle and casual game creators) has introduced two new brands of proprietary playing cards: WILD & SPLIT.

WILD is a 65-card deck. Each deck includes the traditional 52 playing cards (Diamonds, Spades, Clubs, Hearts) plus 13 bonus cards that represent a 5th suit called WILD. Rules for WILD versions of most traditional games will be made available on our website at a future date.

These exclusive playing card decks have been utilized to create different types of gaming content for the gaming industry, including but not limited to:

WILD Blackjack, WILD 21, WILD Tic-A-Tac 21, WILD Poker, WILD Texas Hold’em, WILD Pai Gow Poker, WILD In-Between Poker, WILD Tic-A-Tac Poker, WILD Baccarat, WILD Mini Baccarat, WILD Casino War, WILD Solitaire, WILD Rummy, WILD Up & Down Rummy and many more.

We are giving you the opportunity to own the WILD Playing Card decks months before they are available in retail stores, casinos and other gaming platforms. Own a piece of history!

Spice up your favorite game by using the WILD Playing Card deck. You are only limited by your imagination!

As a contributor to our campaign, you will be one of the first people to own these revolutionary playing cards.


What We Need, What You Get

This campaign is looking to raise $20,000. The funds will be used to manufacture the new WILD playing card decks. We've already paid for all the research and development!

  • Check out our different perks and contribute to be one of the first people to get in on the ground floor. You'll receive some of the first decks ever manufactured!
  • With your help, we are more than confident that we will reach our campaign goal.

The Impact

Your contribution will help launch the WILD Playing Card decks which will revolutionize and revitalize the industry.

  • These cards are going to change the gaming and playing cards industries worldwide.
  • Don't worry, we'll get it done! Over the past few years, we have launched several products worldwide.

Risks & Challenges

With any project, there may be risks and hurdles that may need to be overcome. We have taken every step to minimize those risks. The only possible risk that may arise is a delay in the delivery date of your perks.

  • We have been in business for many years and have processes in place to overcome any risk that may come about.
  • We have several manufacturers that we can use to manufacture our products to ensure that our timelines are met.
  • We only use manufacturers that abide by a Code of Ethics that meet or exceed industry standards.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that sometimes people are not able to help by making a monetary contribution. You can help us reach our goal in other ways:

  • Please help spread the word about our campaign through different social media platforms and invite your friends.
  • Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools to help spread the word!


Lets get WILD!


Below are examples of what the playing mats may look like (we reserve the right to change/update the designs). All products are meant for casual and leisure play.

WILD Texas Hold'em Mat


WILD Blackjack Mat


WILD Mini Baccarat Mat

story:
The Game

Berry Smooth is a match three game (think Candy Crush/Bejeweled) for iPhone, iPad and Android. It is out now on Google Play, Amazon Appstore and iTunes Appstore.
  • We now need funds to get it noticed and get more people enjoying the game.
  • We have some great initial data which show people just love our game and our retention rates are well above industry average
  • With 100 challenging levels so far, the fun just goes on
  • Great in-game music from a professional musician who has worked on Hollywood films such as Olympus Has Fallen and Need For Speed

What We Need

This is the plan for funding:
  • Increasing the number of users: The app stores are crowded places and it is tough to get noticed. Your funding will help us promote Berry Smooth and bring the fun to more people. We will use Facebook ads and in-game adverts to spread the word about our awesome game.
  • Facebook Version: Our Facebook version of the game is so close to completion and with your funding we will finish the last few bits of coding. Facebook is the biggest online games platform and the opportunities to convert Facebook players into mobile game players is massive.
  • Enhancing the game: We have 100 levels so far. Part of the money raised in this campaign will go towards developing more levels including new ways to give players hours of playing pleasure!

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Download the game and give it a play 
  • Tell all your friends
  • Like us on Facebook
  • Leave us a 5 star review in the app store
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Let the fun begin!

Imagine for just a second, Those games where you just run, collect coins and jump objects and boosters for a long time. Seems like a fun thing to do at first, but have you ever won any good out of it? I'm pretty sure not. Imagine, You vs a friend side by side doing the above. Plus more action than just running and jumping.  Yes that sounds a lot better. Is this Co-op? Maybe, Multiplayer? Maybe so... What if i told you is something you will love and no longer play solo again, is that fun enough? For me that's a Hell Yeah! Well here goes more deep details...

Total players 1 or 2, both will have different objectives during the game. Objective 1, The runner. What will the runner do? The runner will Obviously run as fast as he could and will use power ups & boosters to enhance running performance. Objective 2, The Blocker. What's the job of the blocker. Similar to runner but he/she will have unique power ups to block or slow you down so you may not finish your task/challenge. 

What i ask from all supporters, this contribution will aid on Development of the game & Successful Launch on its timed goal date which is March 12th or earlier. The game began development late 2015 and has been slowly progressing do to idea changes and enhances. 
Your contribution will mean Tons to its development & improvements.

What We Need & What You Get

The amount required for development will help the following.

It is very important for my donors to know as to what is the work for which this money will be utilized. So just to make things more transparent I have given the details of the pending work where I will be using your money to complete the game. I have given the remaining work details below.

Please note: This is a game in progress and it is not on its final form. We are only using example illustrations for better understanding where are we at this point. your help will increase work effort & implement required pending development features.

Designing:-

In Designing I have couple of work pending to make the game exciting.

UI:-

1.  Loading Screen

loading bar, background image

2.  Menu Screen

Background

Logo(game name)

Buttons( help , Selecting Character, Credits, Play, Settings, Quit)

3.  Character selection  window

Buttons(back forward ok)

statistics bars(performance of car etc)

4.  Option/Setting Screen

5.  Help Screen

1.Background

2.How to play information

6.  Leaderboard

1.Background

2.Final result statistics

7.  Game Screen

Runner HUD(Active power progress, Total time, Life3)

Blocker HUD(Obstacle List Active and Disable, Total time)

3D Assets Designing:-

Above we have talked about the Screens that need to be designed. Here we are talking about different 3D environments, Character and their Animation that will be visible in the gameplay.

3D Assets

Concept Design Human Characters

Female

Concept Design Animal Characters

Crab Mother

Baby Crab


Here are some of the work that is being pending on the development part.

DEVELOPMENT PENDING WORK

Game Modes

Hunter challenge

Runner challenge

Banana steal

Catch em all

Mother Crab Hunt

Speed Modes

Rookie  -- Normal speed

Intern – Intermediate

Elite -- High speed

Select Game Type Button

Single player or multiplayer

Data Base

Level Design

For all 5 types of modes

Game Play

Controls

Power Ups

Coconut Bazooka

Liberty bell



More Options and descriptions will be added as we progress thru the campaign.


Unique Perks for contributors

  • Thank you note.
  • Participate in beta testing with a Free key
  • Free account on game launch with 10,000 credits
  • Free account on game launch with 20,000 credits
  • Free account on game launch with 30,000 credits
  • Free account on game launch with 40,000 credits
  • Free account on game launch with 50,000 credits
  • 1 free avatars on game launch
  • 2 free avatars on game launch
  • 3 free avatars on game launch
  • 4 free avatars on game launch
  • 5 free avatars on game launch
  • Name in game credits on our Facebook page and website
  • Ability to become Partners 
  • Always have access to VIP discounts
  • Be our priority list of names for Updates on development & other games
  • Get your selves Keys and become Game Testers
Ask about the Secret Perk!

The Impact & Development process!

This is a preview of the UI in the game...


Here we have The Pause button at the top left hand corner, Bottom left shoes power ups & booster bottoms, Top right show distance amount, Bananas collected (coins) & the player profile with the last score.

Ingame character:

the name of this character is Billy.

This is just the Model of his creation using Unity, first character and main of the game!


Background scene & map obstacles:

 Here we have a Beach scene with rocks, trees, seats & more. This is the Map Creation Part.

Here is a illustration of Character movement for quick preview of game development process.

Here's a quick video of character being tested on the map & obstacles. Note, there will be Enhanced to make this a more appealing Game. The experience its expected to be Great.


Does it sound fun yet? How about just a bit more details, hopefully we can get this game going!

Objectives: 

Timed Run: A timer will be used for players to go against the CPU or live players to beat the best score before time runs out. Time will varies depending how long it takes a live players to fall off the map, set times will be placed to VS the CPU. 1 player can beat another or 2 players can join and play against each other. Each player will have abilities to help/prevent others from winning/loosing. (2 players max)

Knock out: Challenge a Live player to go against you on a timed game. Your role will be the blocker or the racer. The objective is to prevent one or the other from getting ahead of you or knocking them off the map. 

Role 1: Racer.You as the racer, you must race thru all challenges the blocker sets out towards you. Your path will be blocked and other abilities will be used to slow you down. You will also have your own pocketed abilities to help you get passed those obstacles.

Role 2: Blocker. Your duty is to prevent the racer from reaching their objective. You will use all of your abilities and in game obstacles to slow the racer down or completely stop them. Nature will be on your side depending on the weather and how you will use your abilities. 


In game Power ups & boosters:

Hawk Wind speed 

Runner speed ration increases for a limited time

Banana peel 

Blocker uses banana peels against runner, making the slow down for 2 seconds.

Coconut bazooka 

Uses a bazooka containing x amount of ammo to knock off player or against obstacles

Quick example image


Tsunami

Call upon a large sea wave to dramatically kicks opponent off the map (end game)

Earthquake 

Call upon earth causing destruction to dramatically stop runner for a limited time. Makes runner do certain moves to stay in map otherwise may cause knock off (game end)

Score Multiplier:This ability will increase your Score Multiplier by 1. Having a high multiplier results in those massive scores which can help place you high up the leader board.  

Nature block 

Use nature to rapidly grow roots of all sizes from a distance, creating a more complex path.

& much more!


Risks & Challenges

Our main obstacle is resources, I am not a coder and no one does anything for free unless paid. With your help, we will jump over this Brick wall separating us from time consumption & no progress, to Progress of development and Successful Launch. Another bump on the road will be Exposure to the world, if no one knows about it, how can they be part of it? anything from all of you will do us a great mayor help. Remember, you're not just helping the development of a game, The game swore to help lives as well.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute? No problem. We still ask for another simple favor. Share us, get the word out and make some noise about us. Help us as much as you can and we will thank you in so many ways. Use the Indiegogo Sharing tools to aid you on the exposure of this Campaign. 

What if we don't reach our Goal?

As our campaign is Flex Funding, we where not able to change into a fixed funding. Any funds raised will be used towards minor development process. those who have already supported us will receive what they have pledged for & those who have shared will also be recognized by us once we come to a successful launch. 

Team Members:

Designing Team:-

  1. Gaurav Rawat:- Senior Designer and Team Lead
  2. Hemant Nayal:- 3D Designer
  3. Manish Bajpai:- Concept Artist
  4. Amit Kuliyal:- Animator
Development Team:-
  1. Inder Singh:- Senior Developer and Team Lead
  2. Manish Bhatt:- Developer
  3. Suman Uniyal:-Special Effect Developer and Game Tester

Director: Jerson Morillo

Development company: Logic Simplified

LogisticTeam

Patent Pending 2017

As our campaign is Flex Funding, we where not able to change into a fixed funding. Any funds raised will be used towards minor development process. those who have already supported us will receive what they have pledged for & those who have shared will also be recognized by us once we come to a successful launch. 
Team Members:
Designing Team:-

Gaurav Rawat:- Senior Designer and Team Lead
Hemant Nayal:- 3D Designer
Manish Bajpai:- Concept Artist
Amit Kuliyal:- Animator


Development Team:-
Inder Singh:- Senior Developer and Team Lead
Manish Bhatt:- Developer
Suman Uniyal:-Special Effect Developer and Game Tester
  Director: Jerson MorilloDevelopment company: Logic SimplifiedLogisticTeamPatent Pending 2017

story:
Short Summary

We are FORFICTIONmobile, a small indie app developer team of three guys from Hungary who loves making mobile games - as hobby.

We sat together in 2012 and started making apps for Nokia platforms back then. We have started with simple ones - Nightlamp rulez! :D - and as our experience raised we went for more...

Our apps were received well, millions of users downloaded and used them but Nokia has collapsed, our personal life has given us other challenges, so app development went on pause.

Couple of weeks ago we sat together again and decided we should have given it a try again and let's see how we can grow up to challenges of modern era.

Not to mention we are planning to test the water with idea when crowdsourcing makes a multi-platform game Open Source. Something what id Software did with Doom but from the beginning...

Long story short, we have decided porting our best game, Gooble Invasion, to modern platforms and  here comes YOU who will finally judge how good the idea is...

What We Need & What You Get

Hobbyist or not we still need some funding for this project. We do not want to be hypocrite - it takes time, we have to invest into tools and equipments for development and testing and, telling the truth, we would like to see some revenue at the end...


Supporting us with perks you not just make porting happen but you will see additional benefits and some extras such as:

  • The Co-Executive Producer perk - your name & [optional] picture in Game Credit
  • ApplePie perk : making it available for iOS
  • Fishermen perk : making it available for Sailfish
  • Glazier perk : making it available for WP 8.1+
  • Joulupukki perk : the ultimate grand prize - we promise releasing source code as free, open source artifact for all supported platforms
  • last but not least, fancy gifts for certain perks: t-shirts and keyrings with figures from the game:

Size and color may vary according to your needs. For more, see Gallery.

Primary target platform of the port is Android but we would like to make it available for more. It depends on how well dedicated sub-targets and perks are received by our backers: if all dedicated perks are backed for certain platform, porting will happen - otherwise there is no any guarantee...

Risks & Challenges

We are fully aware of your concerns about what if the campaign fails. We cannot ensure you it will not happen.

But we DO promise you we will try to do our best avoiding it. 

  • we, FORFICTIONmobile, were premium developers of Nokia platforms having supports from millions of users downloading and using our applications there.
  • one of our application was rewarded with 3rd prize of Game Category of Nokia Asha Developer Competition in 2013
  • we at FORFICTIONmobile love making mobile games. It is not our daily job but our hobby. We make them all primarily for you but we make them for us as well...
  • although mobile application development does not make our bread an butter, we are battle hardened veterans with decades of cumulative experience in software development and art
  • and last but not least, we are planning to use cross platform tools - Qt/QML for ones who care about the details
We already have some of artwork ready and working prototypes running on several platforms, such as Android, Sailfish and WP.

Bunch of relentless enemies are already ready to launch the invasion: 

You can see them in form of key-ring for keyMee! perk, too.

Other Ways You Can Help

If, for one reason or an other, you decide not to make your contribution now we would really appreciate your help in any other format:

  • Share our campaign with your friends on Facebook, Twitter or any of your preferred choice
  • Come back and download the game when it is ready - it will not fly without YOU! 
We are eagerly waiting for seeing you all in the Hall of Fame of ones who already have defeated the Invasion.

story:
I'm Kat, I am a co-owner of EnVision gallery, a local artist, a board game enthusiast, and a long-time admirer of Mayne Island.  I've lived on Island for nearly 4 years, and have been visiting Mayne since I was 15 years old.  

While playing "Bird-opoly" with friends, laughing at how ridiculous it is the game even existed, I thought it would be amazing to have "Mayne-opoly" produced in limited editions.  Not only would it be hilarious to "buy" sections of the island and get stuck in "Gaol" (our museum!  it used to be a jail!  check it out!), but it could operate as a way of getting people to know the island better, locals and visitors alike.

I am currently prototyping out a board on which every space (named after Mayne island locations and roads) available for purchase as a property in the game is colour-coordinated to roads on the map, and have thought up quite a few "Community Chest"/"Chance" cards that relate to local island businesses (which could be identified with markers on the map that coordinate to the cards).


Can we legally do this?  

Yes! Monopoly was originally invented by a Quaker to "prove the evils of capitalism" - it is a board game in the public domain - allowing anyone to make their own version without requiring licensing rights.


But producing a professional-level board game with so many pieces is an expensive endeavour - something that we simply don't have the extra funds to back ourselves.

We have priced out production through a board-game publishing company, and we're confident we can sell a minimum of 50 regular editions and 10 collectors editions.

We've created this page to drum up funding to get it produced, but not only do you have the opportunity to own and play the game, if you run a business on Mayne Island, you have the opportunity to help us write it into the game!   

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

Not only will it cost a minimum of $1500 to order a very limited first edition run of them, but we will be putting in a fair amount of time sourcing pieces, creating the graphics, and developing the cards - it's a pretty intensive process, and we'd rather not contribute all of this time for free.

By contributing funding to this project, you'll be assisting a group of low income islanders to support themselves, as well as getting various perks!  Check out the list of contribution levels and see how you can pre-purchase a copy of the game,  order a deluxe collectors edition, highlight your Mayne Island business in the game, or even have your own square on the board!

 

First Edition vs.

Deluxe Collectors Edition

The First Edition will contain:

1 - Custom Folding Game Board

with photos of locations of Mayne & a map with all roads and businesses marked out.

2 - 30 Property cards with info about each location/business

3 - A minimum of 40 "Chance"/"Community Chest" cards

with circumstances specific to Mayne Island's lifestyle, events, locations, and businesses.

4 - 6 generic plastic/wooden player pawns

5 - 125 generic play money bills

6 - 32 plastic houses, 12 composite hotels, 2 plastic dice

7 - An 8 page booklet that describes different locations on Mayne, as well as the rules!

The Deluxe Collectors Edition will contain:

1 - Custom Folding Game Board

with photos of locations of Mayne & a map with all roads and businesses marked out.

2 - 30 Property cards with info about each location/business

3 - A minimum of 40 "Chance"/"Community Chest" cards

with circumstances specific to Mayne Island events, locations, lifestyle, and businesses.

4 - 6 metal (pewter) player pawns reflecting Mayne Island life

5 - 125  custom "Mayne Dollars" play money

6 - 32 handmade clay cob houses, 12 handmade clay B&B's & 2 plastic dice

7-  An 8 page booklet that describes different locations on Mayne, as well as the rules!

How you can contribute:

You can make a contribution on this website, or contact me directly at mayneopoly@gmail.com

If this project isn't fully realized we will return all funds.

story:
Back to 2015 summer, two young senior students were discussing to initiate the graduation thesis design. It was clear that the designed project would be a interesting game, but the game type yet to be clarified. “Maybe we can design small demo of Cthulhu oriented ARPG game in respect of Dark Soul”, said by Gypsum, “It will take too long to meet the deadline, I’d rather to make a phone based small game like Hearthstone which is so fantastic to challenge your intelligence” Daniel replied while still staring on his phone screen. 

（Fig. Prototype testing party held in Gypsum and Daniel's university.）

Let’s just make something simple and fun to get rid of hundred hours to meet final boss or buying cards combination. It will be a strategy game by concerting your whole chess pieces moving steps and matching with magic spelling pace. It will provide simple fun combat for friends to play together like old day games.

 

Now the game begins.  A meteorite falls to the ocean surrounded by the continent "Valotha". Dark force inside the meteorite breeding with unknown fear spreading to the whole continent. Citizens were left by the old god. People lost faith and gradually infected by dark force. Wars for survival and faith started between three guilds "Stone Forge",  "Advantum" and "Natura" led by three heros.

Only those have patience and unbreakable will can find the final answer of the meaning of living.

 

 

Game Elements

-Map/HP/Prestige point/AP(Action point)/AR(Attack range)/Birth point/Skill point/Population/Hero card/Retinue card/Skill card

Rules of The Game

-Two players have a separate birth point, each birth point has five grids.

-Player has one hero and three other units .A total of four units.

-Player takes his turn alternately. In the turn, player can summon units or use skill cards.

-Unit can be summoned on the birth point, unless the unit has a special effect.

-Player gets 1 skill point each time his turn starts.

-Each turn can’t be finished unless the player’s population reach the requirement of 4, otherwise he should summon more units.

-Player can call Command Operation on his turn.

Command Operation:It includes four directions(up, down, left and right).Command operation takes action on your military. Friend units will react to the player's command according to the direction,each unit will attack the enemy stand on the grid equals to its AR(attack range) point in its direction, however they will move one grid in its direction instead if there is no enemy. Units without AP point as well as these are blocked in their direction won't react to your command.

-Skill cards can help you to control game situations and give you more ways to win.

The core of the game is your command. Think ahead. Where are your hero and units after the action? Attack or retreat? They will influence your game advancement.

Victory Conditions

-Kill the enemy hero.

-Your Prestige point reachs ten.

You can choose a more suitable way for your military to win.

 

 

 

  



 

GQJoy and subordinate Zenox game studio is a player-oriented team. We’re young, passionate gamers, and endeavor to make interesting games that appeal to people like us.
Our goal is to create some new play mechanism to bring better experience to our audience. By that, we have developed Lunar Stone: Origin of Blood under VR platform as an attempt which is now released on Steam(http://store.steampowered.com/app/553800/). 
We are desperate to communicate with our fans to make both a better game and a better game community. To be honest, we are lack of resource of social media channel and market promotion experience. We deem Indiegogo an extreme important way to communicate with our players. It is always our wish to get feedback and involvement for the whole progress of the development.
Zenock is our newest game which we designed for hard core strategy players.We always try to be as transparent as business allows. This means letting our fans and supporters know what’s going on. 
We will pour our passion, grit and persistence into Zenocks!

  • ​Bob Shen:Producer
  • Gypsum Shen:Game Director&Developer
  • Danniel Gu:Game Director&Head of Art
  • Soledad Shao:Game designer&3D Artist
  • Niu Niu:Concpet Artist
  • Yukezi Zhou:Key Game Developer
  • Armo Wang:Musician&Game Developer

story:
click image for more reviews

Gameplay & Review by Starlit Citadel   

 

  • "The zombie theme is not so pervasive that it makes non zombie fans uncomfortable." - Board Game Tavern Review
  • "It seems the game goals and simple mechanics drive player behavior in a more organic way than, say, Dead of Winter."  - Neil Robinson

Indeed, the gameplay is quite open ended, making room for genuine motives and storylines to emerge rather than be prescribed.  As one group calls it: "an automatic zombie-movie plot generator".  Also, the setting is relatively pleasant, rather than a dark shadowy cityscape like most other games in the genre. And it's not about killing as much as other modes of survival.

 

This campaign is about spreading the EfSI virus as freely as possible, $25cad for a copy of the game.  This is possible because we don't have the staff expenses (nor the marketing) of most publishers. 

 

 

We are hoping to unleash this batch of games into the world so we can confidently move forward to make a trilogy of it (Escaped from... / Return to...), as well as entirely new games.

Whether or not you are able to contribute at this point in time, we appreciate your checking it out this far.

Happy Holiday season!

Rob & Dan Straker

story:
Every star the eye can see is a life, and has a story. 

These Stars of Destiny are the greatest heroes and villains from all stretches of time. In the year 6.023.7 a contest was held to honor The Stars,"The Champions of Destiny Cup!" 
       Advanced technology harnesses the energy in The Stars, and manifests them in the arena. They compete every year for the title of "Champions of Destiny!" When the competition ends, they return to the skies; as shining beacons of everlasting life.
The arena awaits, Traveler...

The Stars of Destiny is a Mobile App for iphone and android devices.

  • Stars uses a unique touch-interactive battle system that lets you engage directly with your characters.
  • Touch, drag, tap controls for fast and strategic combat!
  • Watch your friends as they make their moves against you!
  • Play hands-on with your favorite heroes and villians!


Who are we?

Hello, my name is Edward Ruiz Jr, and I am the creator of The Stars of Destiny.
Me, two of my close friends/colleagues, and my father have a dream to open our own indie game studio, Silent Nights. Stars will be our first title to launch.

  • We are a core team of four people working every free moment for the last 18 months to make this game a success.
  • Two of our four founding members(including myself) have been nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Visual Effects in a Series
    (artist and producer, same project).We have over 10 years of experience in effects for Television and Film.
  • Your contribution will "give the Tin Man his heart." With the funds raised we will breathe beautiful life into our first creation and take our game to launch.
  • A short intro with my son :

What are you paying for?

The Stars of Destiny is playable now in a closed alpha due to our hard work and personal resources. We've come to indiegogo so we can finish development and take our first game to market. With a pledge to the campaign you get a pass to the closed alpha, bonuses at launch, and content exclusive to indiegogo backers! With the reward and InDemand system we'll be able to raise the funds we need while offering really fun rewards for backers.

  • $30,000 is our goal.
  • -$20K(19.8 to be precise) will go to final engine development.
    The core combat logic is in the alpha. Now we need to implement the UI, HD graphics, extra characters, etc. This is a fixed cost like the others.
  • -$6K will be used for the character art, animations, and effects.
    Considering how expensive those things are, it's a good thing we work in that industry and work with friends! The art alone could cost more than the game sometimes! I'm hiring some help because it's hard to do most of the creative part alone. Another set of hands will be so helpful to me.
  • -$4K will be used for sound, voices, and music.
    Luckily I live in Southern California and have friends that do voice overs and music. This will pay for the assets we need to launch.
  • If we don't meet our goal we'll spend every dime on development to take this game to market. You've invested in us. That's something we take VERY seriously.

Your rewards!!

  • First expansion revealed at our first funding Milestone!
  • Backers receive first character expansions for free!
  • IndieGoGo exclusive characters to be revealed...
  • With your contributions this game will come to be and you will be able to hold the reward in your very hands.

You're a part of the team!

With your feedback on The Stars of Destiny's alpha we can deliver a robust beta tailored to its users(you). From there we will have a launch title that will have been crafted by the team and the community. 

  • Play your friends, play their friends! Engage in feedback discussions with the creators!
     
  • You're part of a team that has seen its share of tough projects and deadlines. Over the years in the visual effects industry we've been in situations where it's the 11th hour, our back is up against the wall, and we only have the content we create to make it out. We've seen through those challenging projects, and we'll see this one through as well!
     
  • When I came up with the idea I thought of the Super Street Fighter tournaments we used to have as kids, all huddled around the console waiting for the next match .
    This is a competitive game, but a fun one for all ages. The first time you raise your hand in victory after a close match, whatever age you are, we hope it was fun, and that moment is what this game is all about. Good ol' fun and adrenaline for everyone. 

Risks & Challenges

  • The primary risk is timing. Development can always hit close to the target date, but can get minor pushes to ensure quality. The alpha development went smooth as silk, taking the title to launch will be the same with proper funding.
  • We will not encounter any fluctuating expenses.
    We have many years of experience budgeting resources, we planned our costs and inked them very carefully.
  • The development costs have been budgeted from proposals, we know how much it costs to take this to market.

Spread the word, Bird!

We know not everyone will be able to back us, and that's okay, we still appreciate your interest in our game! If you want to help our campaign in other ways, spread the word and ask people to check out the game!

  • Follow us on Twitter @_StarsofDestiny
  • Like us on Facebook @TheStarsofDestiny
  • Follow us on instagram @silentnightsgames
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools for easy access!
story_txt:
Every star the eye can see is a life, and has a story. 
These Stars of Destiny are the greatest heroes and villains from all stretches of time. In the year 6.023.7 a contest was held to honor The Stars,"The Champions of Destiny Cup!"        Advanced technology harnesses the energy in The Stars, and manifests them in the arena. They compete every year for the title of "Champions of Destiny!" When the competition ends, they return to the skies; as shining beacons of everlasting life.The arena awaits, Traveler...
The Stars of Destiny is a Mobile App for iphone and android devices.

Stars uses a unique touch-interactive battle system that lets you engage directly with your characters.
Touch, drag, tap controls for fast and strategic combat!
Watch your friends as they make their moves against you!
Play hands-on with your favorite heroes and villians!



Who are we?
Hello, my name is Edward Ruiz Jr, and I am the creator of The Stars of Destiny.Me, two of my close friends/colleagues, and my father have a dream to open our own indie game studio, Silent Nights. Stars will be our first title to launch.

We are a core team of four people working every free moment for the last 18 months to make this game a success.
Two of our four founding members(including myself) have been nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Visual Effects in a Series(artist and producer, same project).We have over 10 years of experience in effects for Television and Film.
Your contribution will "give the Tin Man his heart." With the funds raised we will breathe beautiful life into our first creation and take our game to launch.
A short intro with my son :



What are you paying for?
The Stars of Destiny is playable now in a closed alpha due to our hard work and personal resources. We've come to indiegogo so we can finish development and take our first game to market. With a pledge to the campaign you get a pass to the closed alpha, bonuses at launch, and content exclusive to indiegogo backers! With the reward and InDemand system we'll be able to raise the funds we need while offering really fun rewards for backers.

$30,000 is our goal.
-$20K(19.8 to be precise) will go to final engine development.The core combat logic is in the alpha. Now we need to implement the UI, HD graphics, extra characters, etc. This is a fixed cost like the others.
-$6K will be used for the character art, animations, and effects.Considering how expensive those things are, it's a good thing we work in that industry and work with friends! The art alone could cost more than the game sometimes! I'm hiring some help because it's hard to do most of the creative part alone. Another set of hands will be so helpful to me.
-$4K will be used for sound, voices, and music.Luckily I live in Southern California and have friends that do voice overs and music. This will pay for the assets we need to launch.
If we don't meet our goal we'll spend every dime on development to take this game to market. You've invested in us. That's something we take VERY seriously.


Your rewards!!








First expansion revealed at our first funding Milestone!
Backers receive first character expansions for free!
IndieGoGo exclusive characters to be revealed...
With your contributions this game will come to be and you will be able to hold the reward in your very hands.



You're a part of the team!
With your feedback on The Stars of Destiny's alpha we can deliver a robust beta tailored to its users(you). From there we will have a launch title that will have been crafted by the team and the community. 

Play your friends, play their friends! Engage in feedback discussions with the creators! 
You're part of a team that has seen its share of tough projects and deadlines. Over the years in the visual effects industry we've been in situations where it's the 11th hour, our back is up against the wall, and we only have the content we create to make it out. We've seen through those challenging projects, and we'll see this one through as well! 
When I came up with the idea I thought of the Super Street Fighter tournaments we used to have as kids, all huddled around the console waiting for the next match .This is a competitive game, but a fun one for all ages. The first time you raise your hand in victory after a close match, whatever age you are, we hope it was fun, and that moment is what this game is all about. Good ol' fun and adrenaline for everyone. 


Risks & Challenges

The primary risk is timing. Development can always hit close to the target date, but can get minor pushes to ensure quality. The alpha development went smooth as silk, taking the title to launch will be the same with proper funding.
We will not encounter any fluctuating expenses.We have many years of experience budgeting resources, we planned our costs and inked them very carefully.
The development costs have been budgeted from proposals, we know how much it costs to take this to market.


Spread the word, Bird!
We know not everyone will be able to back us, and that's okay, we still appreciate your interest in our game! If you want to help our campaign in other ways, spread the word and ask people to check out the game!

Follow us on Twitter @_StarsofDestiny
Like us on Facebook @TheStarsofDestiny
Follow us on instagram @silentnightsgames
Use the Indiegogo share tools for easy access!

story:
Short Summary

Hello all! My name is Joseph Caddell, founder and Creative Director of Studio237. I racked up 8 years of experience as a 3D Artist in the games industry after graduating with a B.S. degree, majoring in Game Art & Design. I also dabbled in film vfx. I’ve done everything from creating environments, lighting, effects and all the technical aspects that come with it. I’ve worked alongside skilled artists from studios such as MPC, Method Studios, Fox VFX Lab, Aaron Sims Creative, and Digital Domain. I worked from the smallest indie mobile games, to blockbuster animated feature Mouse Guard, and The Call of The Wild (2020).

About Vodou

The Elevator pitch: “The year is 1930. In the southern United States, a black farmer (Arthur) is suffering from PTSD. Arthur Discovers Vodou and begins a journey to regain control of his mental stability and heal his dying father, in search of a better life”. It’s a 3rd person psychological horror that’s inspired by the Vodou religion (proper spelling), and HP Lovecraft cosmic horror. 

 

Behind the concept (TL;DR)

This game is a culmination of my personal life experiences, and my family heritage. Although we’re designing it to give players a fun and horrifying experience, it’s also very emotional, and narrative driven. I also want to find a way to show the richness of black culture in the lore. The game does not pander to social or political agendas. My vision is to balance the recognition of black culture in games, badass memorable gameplay, and deliver a rich narrative.

https://www.stu237.com/games

 

This game is a culmination of my personal life experiences, and my family heritage. Although we’re designing it to give players a fun and horrifying experience, it’s also very emotional, and narrative driven. The idea is not to make a game that panders to social or political agendas. Ultimately, my vision is to balance the recognition of black culture in games, bad ass gameplay, and deliver a rich narrative.

What We Need & What You Get

The TL;DR

The game has been in pre-production for six months, since its inception. Here’s the short and simple of our 2020 road map.

June - RELEASE TEASER TRAILER: We’re working on making a teaser trailer for a June release.

July-August - RELEASE VERTICAL SLICE: Ideally we would like to have a vertical slice (VS) completed by June, since the first two quarters of the year are critical for investors to make financial decisions for the year. Unfortunately since we’re short a programmer, we’ll have to trust fate that we can release it later. So anywhere between July and August we want to have a VS completed, so we can pitch for higher funding.

 

December - RELEASE ALPHA: By this time we should have the alpha completed and ready to send to a select group for play testing.

Budget breakdown for 2020:

Gameplay Programmer/Engineer: Implement all gameplay mechanics and features. They need to make sure the framework of the project is shippable for current and next-gen consoles, and PC. = $4,000/month. About one and a half months of development is required for the vertical slice.

 

Music & Sound Design - 4 new pieces of music for the game we have planned out, plus custom sound effects = $6,000

Concept Art - We have many more environments that need to be created. Arthur’s farm/home, Antagonist place of residence, gameplay way points, local forest and places for the player to explore, and a few others without spoiling the game (all of which equal out to 15). Lastly creature designs, and  special ability animation designs = ~$6,590

Some parts of the funding will come out of pocket from myself. There’s obviously more detail that I have in regards to budget, but for the sake of simplicity and not to bore you, I believe this should hopefully suffice. I may come back to edit this. Of course, if you have any questions about funding, please ask! :)

Rewards!!

Those who support us receive access to the vertical slice, which is normally exclusive for investors and publishers. It's not common for vertical slices to be given to the public. Lastly, a free copy of the game when it's released. I'm thinking about signed art work, but still figuring out the legistics, since our concept artist is in Spain.

 

Risks & Challenges

The risk of this game is the potential for it to not be funded. That's the bottom line. Regardless what happens we will continue to build this game until it's finished. This isn't a one off hobby project, and we take the work we put in seriously. The plan I have for Studio237 is to become a self sustaining studio that will build creative projects for years to come...or at least until carpel tunnel takes over.

Funds help us accelerate production and bring more people on the team we need. With funding we can focus more hours to add features and quality to the game.  Most importantly, it can even lead to us quitting our day jobs and working on this full-time!

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that with current global events it may be hard for some to contribute financially. However you can still help by following and subscribing to your favorite social media outlets, spreading the word, and signing up for our newsletter. We appreciate you, and are forever grateful for helping us out with Vodou!

Website: https://www.stu237.com/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Studio2372

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrAO3xNjLtkiBX...

LInkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/studio237

 

Other funding sources

Ko-fi: https://ko-fi.com/studio237

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/bePatron?u=26529216

 

ARTHUR - Good & Evil Side

 

Arthur's Mother, Gina

 

Fallen Of The Rapture - Main Antagonist

 

Fallen Of The Rapture - Witch Division

story:
~~ About Ficterra ~~

Ficterra is an effort to elevate crafting games to a new plateau.  It is a 3D Sandbox Crafting Adventure with in-game modding that you can explore solo or with friends. 

Countless hours have made the game ready for Beta testing - now we need your help to polish and finish Ficterra. 

~~ Game overview ~~ 

Ficterra starts you with minimal resources in a world filled with diverse biomes and possibilities. Acquire resources to build a limitless inventory of materials to make tools, buildings, and gadgets. Avoid monsters and other hazards while exploring and expanding your world. Each biome offers a variation of landscape and available materials, as well as dangers. Continue to make more sophisticated tools and gadgets. Share with other Ficterra players.

~~ How can I help, you ask? ~~ 

Our funding goal will allow Ficterra to:

  • Run a Beta test during the campaign, using your input to fix issues and improve the game experience
  • We're looking to improve the look and feel of some of our assets. Art costs money 
  • Extend the modding capabilities
  • Get the word out about Ficterra
  • Indiegogo fees - though small, they have to be paid

~~ Why? Get Cool Perks! ~~

Get a jump on game play before the game launches on Steam Early Access. Several perks are $50 CAD or less. Most perks provide beta access and give you a voice on making the game better via the Ficterra Discord channel. Start building your world now! Higher levels include limited edition weapons, tools, multi-player game characters, or even allow you to name a game item. We'll list your name in the game credits for all perks BETA level and higher! 

Our development team have come up a few more personal perks in the higher levels:

  • Access to a private developer Discord channel
  • The lead developer will play a multi-player session with you, providing you insight and tips 
  • Interact with the developer on a game scenario zone, which you will name

         * Names and development input are subject to development team review and approval

Not a gamer? You can gift the license that comes with your perk!

~~ Why you make a difference ~~

As good as the game currently is in Alpha state, your support and input will take it over the top.

If you are passionate about testing, you will make a difference. Alternate perspectives and gameplay methods expose issues and drive further innovation. Bring a friend and test multi-player for us! 

Play Ficterra. Enjoy Ficterra. Talk Ficterra.

Social media interaction attracts more players, so share with friends. More players expands our ability to continue to enhance the game experience based on your feedback playing the game.

~~ What could possibly go wrong? ~~

While we think the game quality is good in Alpha, having a group of dedicated beta testers may uncover some complex issues that could delay the Early Access release date. We also risk getting more awesome ideas than we can possibly add before launch - but it will tell us where you want us to direct future energy.

~~ How else can I help, you ask? ~~

Gamer or not, you can still help!

  • Spread the word about this campaign to friends and fellow gamers. A little noise goes a long way if shared by enough people.
  • Share the link to this site, the Steam page, and the game website.  

Steam page 

 

This Steam Early Access game is currently not a finished game and may or may not change significantly over the course of development. To learn more about Steam Early Access, please visit http://store.steampowered.com/earlyaccessfaq/
