On some levels, movement of Qu is restrained/modified, both to aid in introducing the player to the controls, and to provide new and varied challenges. Hand Controls

 
The game will be released across all major platforms and the control scheme will be customized to fit with each hardware's available accessories to allow greater control.  You can also use the various hand controllers, be they Move controllers for the PSVR, the Move Controller for Oculus, or the Vive's hand controllers. Simply raise your hand in front of you and paint the targets with the targeting reticle. User InterfacePlayers view the action in Vanguard V from a third person perspective, though technically, the player is Qu, and is looking through her visor at the video feed from BiT who follows behind her. The interface consists of Qu, the player targeting reticle, and Qu’s personal shield status. Some events change the perspective including a first person sequence.     Level 1: Re-Entry
 Qu is flying in space with a heat shield as she re-enters the Earth’s atmosphere. With the heat shield active, Qu cannot operate her weapons at full capacity. Plow through the Parasites while dodging debris. Watch out because the Parasites can also shoot projectiles of their own. Keep that shield intact or you’ll burn up! - BiT Level 1: BossParasite cluster through the atmosphere and into the clouds. Qu’s weapons are offline due to the intense heat so she must dodge the shots. Fortunately, she is essentially a fireball and can plow right through individual parasites as the cluster begins to disintegrate. Entering the atmosphere hardcore now. Weapons are offline but hot damn, you're a fireball. Use it! Level 2: The Surface Qu enters the scene blasting through the sound barrier. Fly through valleys, Obsidian Falls and caves to reach the beach. Once at the ocean, Qu flies just above the water and remains parallel to the surface plane. This frees the player to look around at the attacking enemies. Qu’s laser arsenal is now fully operational in this stage, so she can fight back against the Parasites that are evolving rapidly. Level 2 Boss: The Leviathan The fight takes place on a large cylindrical path. We will be flying along the perimeter of the wormhole. Large rocks help us avoid getting hit from time to time, we look across the wormhole to find the titan flying in the same direction. We need to catch up. The leviathan breaks off some smaller enemies that fight with us on the way.As you reach the tail of the boss, you see vulnerable target areas. We don't want to give away any more spoilers for this boss! Level 3: The WormholeQu has now entered the giant tube left by the first impact of the enemy. Here Qu hugs the wall and you tilt your head to have her roll to the left or right. Burrowers will fly through the walls to attack. Use your Megabeam to fire straight forward and take out the threat. Dodge pillars, take out the enemies, avoid falling rocks! Level 3 Boss: The Tumbler This boss has long legs to maneuver rapidly through the wormhole. It curls its legs inwards to roll through at great speed. The tumbler will also go behind Qu and tumble through pillars. BiT will warn you of falling rocks. Watch the shadows for clues or turn around 180 in VR to see for yourself.  Level 4: The Lava CavesQu flies her way through the diamond hot lava caverns. With your heat shield re-activated, dodge lava flows and the elements of the Earth’s core. The stalactites will have parasites. The stalactites fall if you shoot them so time your shots carefully. BiT has short range radar of the caves. Listen to BiT’s directions to avoid danger. Keep that heat shield functioning! Level 4 Boss: Diamond Wyvern The level opens up to a wide liquid diamond lake that goes on for a large distance. There are stalactites that the wyvern flies below. Enemies are perched on the stalactites shooting at you. The wyvern is covered in diamond. It is nearly impossible to break. Players have different strategies they can use to be victorious this boss fight.  Level 5 Boss: The CoreQu has reached the center of the planet and it’s time for the final showdown with the alien invader. Qu flies around the boss from a fixed distance with full 360 degree control. Look which direction you would like to have her rotate and she will follow. There is a layer of rocks with openings along the wall of the final battle. Qu flies under this layer for protection but the core is more than capable of knocking out the cover. This creates more openings for Qu to shoot the core. Dodge the enemy shots, avoid falling debris shaken loose by the enemy, fire everything you’ve got!We don't want to give anymore spoilers out for level 6 or the final ending!   As much as we are lovers of games, we are also lovers of game MUSIC, new and old. We've assembled a team of considerable musical talent to produce a soundtrack that mixes the very best of new and old.

Turn Around - Composed by Jake Kaufman / Vocals by Jessie Seely
 Jake KaufmanA.K.A. Virt. You may already be familiar with Jake's music work on countless video game soundtracks including Shovel Knight, Proton Pulse and will help craft Vanguard V's sonic landscape to fit perfectly with the music and visuals.http://virt.bandcamp.comDan BehrensAKA Danimal Cannon, brings his lightning fast guitar work and metal-enhanced electronica to pump up the soundtrack.  An expert composer, performer, and all around sound man, Danimal loves to get in there, make great music, and leave the crowds begging for more!  He's also a master at mastering audio, bringing the love to our whole sound system.  Learn more at his website.http://danimalcannon.com/    ZeroTransform has partnered up with WarpZone Prints to develop a number of items.  As fans of the title, they've agreed to produce these things at cost to support the cause. Metal CardsThese metal cards are one of the main reason we went with WarpZone Prints.  They developed cards for the NUREN VR project that looked incredible!METAL CARDS for NURENWe will be producing art for red, green, and blue cards.  We will also have a limited platinum card that will be signed by the team. T-SHIRTShow the world that you support VR with this amazing shirt.  We checked around to make sure that we found the best quality place for this task.  Now you can wash your shirt with confidence.  FRAMED 3D PRINTWe've captured some action shots from the game in 3D to frame behind a lenticular sheet to produce 3D pictures.  Seeing is believing and believe me, these are incredible.  THE CLOCKThis clock is stained, sealed, and absolutely gorgeous.  Mad props to WarpZone Prints for creating these.  The back of the clock will be signed by the team and individually numbered.  The clock is just under 12 inches in diameter.  These are limited items.  THE OPTIC CRYSTAL PINNACLE STATUEThese are for those who truly believe in our cause.  The Crystal Pinnacle has tapered sides and a beveled top with laser engraved art from Vanguard V.  You are a foundation builder and as such you are considered a member of the ZeroTransform family.  Your name will be engraved in highly polished optic crystal in a frosty white tone for excellent contrast.  THE TEAMThe core team consists of game experienced game developers with a long list of titles under their belt. 
Justin Moravetz:  Creative Director“Virtual Reality brings people closer than ever before into a world beyond imagination. Human perception can be seamlessly integrated into a digital existence. Never before has 3D content been so physical, so immersive, than in VR. We are at the forefront of innovation and I’m honored to be a pioneer in the wave of the future.” – Justin MoravetzJustin Moravetz is the lead developer and founder of ZeroTransform. He was the primary creator of the previous VR titles, Proton Pulse and Pulsar Arena.Moravetz worked on big titles like Syphon Filter Logan’s Shadow, Resistance Retribution, and Uncharted Golden Abyss, before leaving to pursue is dream of VR development. He believes VR is unexplored territory where new experiences are waiting to be invented. Dreams become reality and reality becomes dreams. He is also an avid chip tune composer, particle effects animator, and voider of warranties. His motto is “Good things come to those who wait. Great things come to those who pursue.” 
Scot Bayless:  Business OperationsBayless joined Capcom as Vice President of Product Development in February 2007.  He parted ways with the company in 2009.  During his time he worked on Street Fighter IV, Dark Void and many other titles.  Prior to working at Capcom, Scot worked at Midway Games in Chicago in charge of the studio production there.  Earlier than Midway, Scot also worked for Electronic Arts, SEGA and Microsoft.  In his early days of development Scot worked on many Dungeons & Dragons titles for SSI for the "Gold Box Series". Jeff Hawthorne:  CodeJeffrey Hawthorne's passion for video games started as a child when he tried his cousin's Nintendo. Since then, he has received his degree in computer science at CAL State Chico with a minor in math. After working for Sony and Play Habit, he became Lead Software Engineer for the one and only ZeroTransform. Gary Spinrad:  SoundGary Spinrad has been working with video game audio for over 20 years. Gary's work can be heard on Phantasmagoria II, Leisure Suit Larry, and five Call of Duty titles. In his spare time, Gary enjoys crushing watermelons and performing with his band, Elviss Simmons. Heather Peterson:  ProductionHeather helps with all things production.  From schedule to social media, there isn't anything she won't hesitate to tackle if it needs doing. Athey Moravetz:  Character DesignAthey worked at Sony for eight years modeling characters and preparing them for animation.  She handles all things creature and character related. Jake Kaufman:  Head of MusicJake Kaufman (aka Virt) is an American video game music composer. After starting out creating arrangements and remixes of video game soundtracks, he began his commercial composing career in 2000 with the score to the Game Boy Color port of Q*bert. He continued to compose music for games for the next couple of years, working primarily with handheld video games. In 2002, he set up the website VGMix, which hosts video game music remixes, and continues to administrate it. His career began to take off over the next few years, resulting in him transitioning jobs into a full-time freelance composer by 2005. Since then he has worked on several big-name projects such as Contra 4, Red Faction: Guerrilla, DuckTales: Remastered, and Shovel Knight. Around that time he composed music for ZeroTransform for the titles Proton Pulse, Pulsar Arena, and the Vanguard V prototype.In early 2015, he and Jessie Seely formed CSP Industries, and launched a Kickstarter for [NUREN] The New Renaissance, a project that they call "the world's first virtual reality rock opera." In late 2015, Kaufman composed and wrote lyrics for Power Overwhelming, the debut album of parody supergroup Big Bad Bosses. Callyn Dorval: Is the voice actor of Qu for Vanguard VCallyn has been involved with theatre from a young age, getting her start in stage work and community theatre. Her interest in voice acting began nearly three years ago, when she was inspired after attending a panel of voice actors for video games.Since then, Callyn has been developing her craft with a focus in video game and animation character work. She has lent her voice to a number of animated projects and radio plays. As an avid video gamer, Callyn's dream is to help contribute her voice to this wonderful medium of storytelling." Joey Groeneweg:is the voice actor of BiT and screenwriter for Vanguard V.  Joey picked up writing eight years ago while staying in Flagstaff, Arizona, home of the Northern Arizona University. Writing mainly, but not exclusively, stand-up comedy, he has performed in different venues all over The Netherlands and parts of the USA.As impressions are one of the main parts of his comedic repertoire, voice acting was a natural next step.  He has been doing voice acting for about two years now, and has had several roles in games, animations and radio plays.Joey has been a gamer since twelve and would love to be able to combine his passion for games, writing and comedy and continue his career in this field. Justin Spice:  Concept ArtJustin Spice has provided fantastic concepts that really convey a sense of scale that defines the look of Vanguard V.  He also does work with Jake Kaufman for NUREN.  USE OF FUNDSThe primary use of the funds is keeping the team fed and expanding the team a bit.  On top of the design, Justin Moravetz also handles the art, special effects, and animation.  We plan on hiring another artist and an animator to assist Justin so he can focus on design more.  We've worked hard to have the tools and tech already in place so funds will go strait into production.  Can't back us? That's ok!Help up by sharing our IndieGoGo on Facebook, Twitter, or your nearest mountain top!See ya soon!

story:
If you intend to extend your support through PayPal then use: PayPal.Me/ankraigameworks. 

 

Short Summary

This project will eliminate your time investment in coding part of game development. You would require only baby steps of programing knowledge ..rest assured the IDE will help you in building games faster, eliminate the need for worrying about functions, API, typos and syntax error. 

What We Need & What You Get

Since, I'm investing my time into into this project. Thus, I need some resources to support myself continue doing it dedicatedly for longer hours. Thus, your support will help me to do so. 

The backers will get the full Visual Scripting IDE for all there favourite game engines with unlimited license.     

The Impact

Usually, the game development involves learning of several programming languages. The game engine can support exporting games to several platforms but what if someone can develop a single platform with which they can build games for different engine. Thus, with this ANKRAI Gamework's CodeWorks I intend to achieve the same.   

Look what others have achieved with this:

https://youtu.be/bkqNNhnG4pc

https://youtu.be/4DoXsNKOgbs

All credits to @smallg(lor of lua prog)  from Game Guru Forum...

 

Risks & Challenges

Risk?? Since, I've already developed the project and completed the Phase I i.e, the development of visual scripting framework for GameGuru 3D Game Engine and distributing it to you guys at the start of the funding campaign itself. Therefore, I don't think my entrepreneurial story would end up as someone who took the money and run away. I've already provided the product from the start itself. Meanwhile I unlock the rest of the game engine you can have a go with its open beta at: https://ank00.itch.io/codeworks

Challenges?

Apart from funds required to balance my part time job, doctoral study and my entrepreneurial ventures. I don't think there isn't a challenge associated with the project which i can't overcome. Though if you want more features to the Visual Scripting IDE, do contact me.   

About ME

If you want to do background research about me then visit: http://ankushrai.webs.com/

https://scholar.google.co.in/citations?user=0eA...

https://www.scopus.com/authid/detail.uri?author...

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute then no worries. Share it with friends and family. 

Hope with your help the project come to its fruition.

story:
A Little About Me

My name is Mike, and I have loved video games and computers since I was a kid. I spent much of my early teens modifying video games and consoles, as well as rebuilding consoles and computers. I taught myself much of my knowledge and continue to do so. I have enjoyed many games over the years, but my favorite games are the survival genre.  I am also a huge fan of old western movies, particularly John Wayne films - Some of my favorite memories are those of my grandfather and I watching John Wayne films together. 
I have waited for years for someone to create a game that includes both the survival genre and a great old western simulation, eventually I stopped waiting and started creating the game I've always wanted to play. Making this game is one of my dreams and I intent to bring it to life no matter what it takes. If you are interested in reading about the game please read below for details about the game.

 

Game Overview

 

Beginning of the game.

Life Is Hell is a wild west multiplayer survival game. You join the game and find yourself in a town (not currently named)  that is situated in the American Wild West. You have a few dollars to your name, what will you do?

The Town:

There are stores to buy tools and sell supplies, a saloon to purchase some food and drink, a bank that you may conduct your financial business at, and a few other shops (NPC Vendors). There are also other businesses that sell various goods and services (Player run shops). Raise cattle to sell, prospect for gold, trap and hunt animals,  bounty hunt and more.

The world:

All rocks and trees are able to be collected, these resources are needed for building houses, wagons, fences, and many other items. There are animals and plants that will help you survive the harsh arid landscape. Coyotes, rabbits, snakes, cows, and horses. Food can be harvested from many of the animals in the wild. Water can be found in cacti, or using water wells. 

In game things to do:

  • Raise Cattle/Horses
  • Build a home, ranch, hideout, or wagons 
  • Gather resources to sell or use
  • Bandit activities 
  • Hunt/Trap animals
  • Make goods to sell in town (clothes, weapons, ammo, consumables)
  • Transport goods for others
  • And more to come

 

Why contribute?

I am currently in need of another developer and a few artists. I have come pretty far working solo on this project, but not everyone is perfect and mistakes happen which delay development. Having more team members would help smooth out and speed up development of this game. ALL updates good and bad are posted to the discord along with images and live streams of development from time to time.

 

Rewards?

All contributors will recieve some special in game items which will be account bound but NOT game breaking, for example if you get a special horse it will not be invincible and can die just like all other players, however it may be slightly faster have a different color and be able to hold more in the saddle bags, etc. Special contributor weapons will also have NO boosted damage but will have custom design and be more valuable as a collectors item. I DO NOT want this to become a pay to win so the perks will be set for mainly decorative limited edition in game items.

The Main Focus of LIH

Although many survival games are on the market, there are not many that are survival roleplaying games. The focus on this game is to merge the RPG aspect with the survival aspect incorporating both player-player interactions and player-NPC interactions. 

 

What can go wrong?

I have been working on this project during quarantine constantly, although this Covid situation has put all of us in a rough place, the time at home also gives us time to pursue the things we want to do most. I will not be releasing this game with false information, there will be bugs and issues, however I will do my best to fix these bugs as they come up. Many games focus on releasing new content before they fix the broken content, which I have experienced in many games. It becomes quite frustrating seeing new DLC to get more money before fixing game breaking issues that currently exist. I will make the main focus on the core functionality of the game rather than constant DLC.

Also I will keep this campaign updated as often as possible and keep everyone in the discord updated as well, joining the discord is free and public please check below.

 

Currently due to funding restrictions, Although I have custom models and such there are pre-made assets that are in the game as place holders until I can add in more custom models. I plan on swapping everything for custom models here in the future. 

Although the funds raised are not nearly enough to completely finish the game, it will however, get us into the alpha stage. The funds will be used for the following.
 

  • Artwork (Modeling, Textures, concept art, and a few other artistic elements)
  • Music (Menu Music, In game ambient sounds, and voicing NPCs) 
  • Hiring freelance developers to assist with the coding.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot afford to contribute you can also contribute by participating in the referral contest. Every referral using your link that contributes to the campaign will get you 1 permanent entry to the weekly raffle held in the development discord.

Join the Discord, Share the social media accounts.

 

Links and Contact info:

story:
note: all videos are old videos and we are working on the latest video trailers, read the FAQ for easier understanding

 

 

Project D: Human Risen is a multiplayer survival game with many islands to explore, build unique vehicles, and survive where players are the last human on earth. Each island will have it own biome and weather. Player will also face many life threatening encountered like mutated plant and animal, extreme weather, wild animal, and deadly disease.

 

 

 

We know, we already have so many survival base game in our playlist, but of course, we do have our dream to create our own survival base game which is not only to push player to survive and loot for ammo/resources, we’ll also push player to organizing their belonging, every aspect in this game is matter.

 

 

The year is 2022, earth hit by terror of extinction, a new virus called D-VIRUS spread fast enough to trigger human extinction. To prevent human extinction, researchers from all over the world gathered to find solution, after a long discussion, they name their project as Doomsday Project. This project have purpose to save humanity by trained teenagers who have potential to survive by teach them basic survival in that matter. The scientist will also build a time-capsule for these survival candidate in hope they’ll have some time to let the virus goes down after a few years when they’re sleeping in the time-capsule.

But, in 2023, this project leaked to public, causing panic in the world, people demand a mass production of this so called time-capsule. Due to the minimal amount of resources they have to build this time-capsule, the scientist decide to move this project to an island away from civilization.

Will they survive? Will this teenager save the world? What’s exactly this virus is? Is this virus will bring death to our planet earth?

 

 

This game feature a basic element of Survival Game like Hunger, thirst, and health. We will also add disease and some new element to support the base mechanic of the game. This game will also provide you with farming and livestock management.

 

  • Various islands

Players can explore various islands, ranging from islands with dense forests, tropical forests, snow islands, volcanic islands,desert island, etc., and not only that we will also present islands with forests that have been mutated due to virrus. for islands with mutated forests will be added when reaching the goal.

The following is a picture of an existing biome.

 

  • Craft, Build & Learn Table

MAKE YOUR OWN HOUSE! Outside world is scary! at the beginning the player can't make everything, the player has to research the items they find then put them in the learn table, from here you will learn to find new crafting recipes


 

  • SEA & Underwater

Players can swim to look for fish at sea but keep in mind not all fish can be eaten, some are poisonous and some are dangerous.​ Players can also make small boats to look for food.

 

  • Vehicle & Driving System

Players can make vehicles such as buggies and bikes by collecting parts that can be found on the beach and other locations. vehicles can be used to bring goods collected from the island, or to be safer from wild animals / mutations. But be aware, some islands are not vehicles friendly because some islands have extreme conditions to be passed by vehicles.

 

Several vehicles that can be made:

- Unique vehicle (if goal is reached)
- Buggy

 


- Motorcycle
- Small boat
- Pickup


if there is a lot of requests from the player we will add more Vehicle

 

 

  • AirShip

As for your concern, because this game will have many islands to explore we also provide you with a unique transportation, an airship to accompany you in your journey. This Airship will become as your second home or your flying home. You can add some survival tool for your airship like Aquarium, Planter, and many more. Don’t forget, you need to repair your airship if serious injury happen to her. Have a nice trip!​

Airship can also be used as a ship if it runs out of fuel and store vehicles in the airship.
 

 

  • Story Mode ( Single Player / Online Co-op )

Players will be taken to complete the mission, because they are chosen people of course their journey will not be easy. Story mode can also be done online. you can play with your friends or random people.

 

  • MMO Mode

If the target goal is reached we will add mmo mode where players can make their own room and others can join. Players can build their base or destroy other people's bases.

But if it is not achieved we will only add online coop that you can play with friends without having pvp

 

  • Smartwatch

The player will see character data on the watch and can set an alarm

 

  • Various weapons & Dual wield

You can also make various types of weapons such as bamboo spears, arrows, wooden knives, etc. Firearms can also be made or found in several places.

not only ordinary weapons we will also add unique weapons such as grappler, jetpack, etc. (if goal is reached)

 

  • First Person And Third Person View

Hate seeing hands everyday? Change to TPS mode!

 

  • Mutated Plant and Animal

As a result of this virus there are some animals that mutate not only depending on the type of animal there are also those that grow so fast. here the player must survive from these unknown animals.

 

  • Normal Plant and Animal

Not all animals and plants are mutated, there are many types of animals that still survive the virus. players will find it easier to find food and resources from normal animals and plants.

 

 

  • Boss Area

Not only various interesting places but every place has a boss area that you can fight with your friends, boss area has drop items that are very rare and good

 

  • PET Mode / Taming Mode And Riding System

Friendly animal is a yes-yes to tame, Vicious animal need to be fed first to gain more trust with players, players can also use them to stand-ground protecting your camp, some animal will also allow you to ride them, like horses.

 

 

  • Gramophone & Collection

Player can craft gramophone and collect vinyl from various places and play it on the gramophone, this vinyl has songs created by our composer that has various types of songs that you can enjoy during your trip, we are targeting 20 songs and here is one example of the song and you can also buy this song package if you are interested in our song the package has around 40 songs

 

  • Inventory, Storage, Hotbar, Wearable

Don’t forget to do some looting though, your need is your priority too! And also, Store some to loot some! create some storage container to store your items before doing an expedition.

Many items that have their own storage such as campfire, vehicles, etc. there is storage that must be put firewood / fuel.

 

  • Tech Tree

Players can choose what ability path they want, here there will be several skills that can be active when techtree is selected. there are several abilities that can be taken such as:

1. Hunting
- can see animal tracks
- shooting accuracy
- can hear distant animal sounds

2. survive
- thirst resistance increases
- food resistance increases
- the ability to search for food by highlight

3.adventure
- can make a grapple hook

4. technology
- can make vehicles
- and various other technology items

Some of the features above are just basic and will change / add if there is a problem.

 

  • Farming & livestock

Players can also get food by planting and livestock by catching animals or getting seeds

 

  • Resource & Items

Players must find crafting materials or to survive such as cutting trees, breaking rocks, looking for food, etc.

 

 

  • Bunker

Players can find important items (story items) in a bunker, bunkers are difficult to find because they can be in water, small island, or in a cave. This place have something you want to keep, don let it loose!

 

  • Customize Character

Plating your cloth with leaves? Use a wood to cover your knee? Or, use some animal bone to create a hat? Have fun with your player!

Video is still in the working stage, later features will be maximized
 

  • Dynamic Weather and Day-Night Cycle

Experience a beautiful day-night cycle and variety of weather. Various kinds of weather such as thunderstorms, sunny, light rain, heavy rain, snow, etc.

 

Day-Night Cycle
Dynamic Weather
 

  • Dynamic Vegetation Interaction

Plants, grass, bushes will move when in contact with the player or other objects such as animals, cars, etc. this will add to the feel of hunting when an animal passes a bush

 

  • Dynamic Seasons

Season in realtime based on the date in the game that you can see on the smartwatch in the player.

Winter​

Spring

Summer

Autumn

 
 

 

We know that we have no further information about our game, we have no long term planning about Project D, we just do it and do it, and update it regularly through our friends opinion and idea, we know that we just a small group of developer but we have a big dream and big hope with this game, please help us to stay survive!

 

 

 

 

We are Catgames Studio, an indie game developer formed in April 2019, who aim to create a unique experience for player who plays our game. With such a small developer with only less than 10 people working on our new project, Project D : Human Risen, this game counted as our big project since we have only small resources. Nevertheless, we will give us our best to build this game as good as other AAA games.

email : service@catgamesstudio.com

web : https://catgamesstudio.com

 

 

You can follow us on :

Youtube

Instagram

Twitter

Facebook

Steam

Discord

 

We recommend that you join our discord server so that it is easier to discuss about the game and also get info and also for the backers will get a special role right

 

 

This game will release in 2020, which month and day we will inform you later when early beta test already done and complete. Just wait, we will update you soon it ready!

 

 

You can meet PROJECT D at Steam Early Access first. 

We are currently focused to running smoothly on Windows. We're a small team. We want to fully focus on Windows(Steam), instead of multiple platforms at once and being unfocused.

 

What is the Steam Early Access?

Steam Early Access enables you to sell a game on Steam while it is still being developed and provides context to customers that a product should be considered "unfinished." Early Access is a place for games that are in a playable alpha or beta state, are worth the current value of the playable build, and that you plan to continue to develop for release.

Releasing a game in Early Access helps set context for prospective customers and provides them with information about your plans and goals before a "final" release.

 

Here are some art from our team such as characters or others. we will do our best to fit the player's expectations.

 

 

 

You can also share our project to your friends, your community, your gamer team mate, etc! Anything you do to support our game we appreciate it! Spread the game, help us standing!

With Project D : Human Risen, we have hope, that we can make a good survival game because we love survival game so much, we want to spread our love of this genre into a shape of survival game.

And of course, we would like to thank you all for your support and we promise to try our best to make this game as good as we can. Please kindly send all your Suggestions and criticism to: service@catgamesstudio.com and stay connected with us 

Once again, thank you,
Catgames Studio
story_txt:
note: all videos are old videos and we are working on the latest video trailers, read the FAQ for easier understanding  Project D: Human Risen is a multiplayer survival game with many islands to explore, build unique vehicles, and survive where players are the last human on earth. Each island will have it own biome and weather. Player will also face many life threatening encountered like mutated plant and animal, extreme weather, wild animal, and deadly disease.   We know, we already have so many survival base game in our playlist, but of course, we do have our dream to create our own survival base game which is not only to push player to survive and loot for ammo/resources, we’ll also push player to organizing their belonging, every aspect in this game is matter.  The year is 2022, earth hit by terror of extinction, a new virus called D-VIRUS spread fast enough to trigger human extinction. To prevent human extinction, researchers from all over the world gathered to find solution, after a long discussion, they name their project as Doomsday Project. This project have purpose to save humanity by trained teenagers who have potential to survive by teach them basic survival in that matter. The scientist will also build a time-capsule for these survival candidate in hope they’ll have some time to let the virus goes down after a few years when they’re sleeping in the time-capsule.But, in 2023, this project leaked to public, causing panic in the world, people demand a mass production of this so called time-capsule. Due to the minimal amount of resources they have to build this time-capsule, the scientist decide to move this project to an island away from civilization.Will they survive? Will this teenager save the world? What’s exactly this virus is? Is this virus will bring death to our planet earth?  This game feature a basic element of Survival Game like Hunger, thirst, and health. We will also add disease and some new element to support the base mechanic of the game. This game will also provide you with farming and livestock management. Various islandsPlayers can explore various islands, ranging from islands with dense forests, tropical forests, snow islands, volcanic islands,desert island, etc., and not only that we will also present islands with forests that have been mutated due to virrus. for islands with mutated forests will be added when reaching the goal.The following is a picture of an existing biome. Craft, Build & Learn TableMAKE YOUR OWN HOUSE! Outside world is scary! at the beginning the player can't make everything, the player has to research the items they find then put them in the learn table, from here you will learn to find new crafting recipes SEA & UnderwaterPlayers can swim to look for fish at sea but keep in mind not all fish can be eaten, some are poisonous and some are dangerous.​ Players can also make small boats to look for food. Vehicle & Driving SystemPlayers can make vehicles such as buggies and bikes by collecting parts that can be found on the beach and other locations. vehicles can be used to bring goods collected from the island, or to be safer from wild animals / mutations. But be aware, some islands are not vehicles friendly because some islands have extreme conditions to be passed by vehicles. Several vehicles that can be made:- Unique vehicle (if goal is reached)- Buggy - Motorcycle- Small boat- Pickupif there is a lot of requests from the player we will add more Vehicle  AirShipAs for your concern, because this game will have many islands to explore we also provide you with a unique transportation, an airship to accompany you in your journey. This Airship will become as your second home or your flying home. You can add some survival tool for your airship like Aquarium, Planter, and many more. Don’t forget, you need to repair your airship if serious injury happen to her. Have a nice trip!​Airship can also be used as a ship if it runs out of fuel and store vehicles in the airship.  Story Mode ( Single Player / Online Co-op )Players will be taken to complete the mission, because they are chosen people of course their journey will not be easy. Story mode can also be done online. you can play with your friends or random people. MMO ModeIf the target goal is reached we will add mmo mode where players can make their own room and others can join. Players can build their base or destroy other people's bases.But if it is not achieved we will only add online coop that you can play with friends without having pvp SmartwatchThe player will see character data on the watch and can set an alarm Various weapons & Dual wieldYou can also make various types of weapons such as bamboo spears, arrows, wooden knives, etc. Firearms can also be made or found in several places.not only ordinary weapons we will also add unique weapons such as grappler, jetpack, etc. (if goal is reached) First Person And Third Person ViewHate seeing hands everyday? And also, Store some to loot some! create some storage container to store your items before doing an expedition.Many items that have their own storage such as campfire, vehicles, etc. there is storage that must be put firewood / fuel. Tech TreePlayers can choose what ability path they want, here there will be several skills that can be active when techtree is selected. there are several abilities that can be taken such as:1. Hunting- can see animal tracks- shooting accuracy- can hear distant animal sounds2. survive- thirst resistance increases- food resistance increases- the ability to search for food by highlight3.adventure- can make a grapple hook4. technology- can make vehicles- and various other technology itemsSome of the features above are just basic and will change / add if there is a problem. Farming & livestockPlayers can also get food by planting and livestock by catching animals or getting seeds Resource & ItemsPlayers must find crafting materials or to survive such as cutting trees, breaking rocks, looking for food, etc.  BunkerPlayers can find important items (story items) in a bunker, bunkers are difficult to find because they can be in water, small island, or in a cave.
